The place was cozy and peaceful, and felt like a little escape. The host gave some great recommendations and was incredibly easy to work with!

This place was absolutely amazing!!! The view from inside and outside the room is breathtaking and even more spectacular than the pictures trust me! We had better view of whales from the Lanai than when we went on our whale watching tour. The location is great as its central to Hilo and great if your wanting to eat and tour around Hilo. if your not scared of the little insects and small reptiles that come with being in a remote location in Hawaii, I would definitely recommend this as its an absolute gem!

We enjoyed our two-nights stay at Leigh's place and even though we didn't see Leigh personally, we felt very welcomed as she left very helpful clear instructions, local recommendations and even a card with champagne and pineapple for our honeymoon. That was a very nice touch which we really enjoyed. The apartment itself was clean, with good amenities (everything you need: big fridge, cutlery, nice coffee, towels, snorkeling gear, bug spray, and even very nice books including travel guides, etc.) The apartment is also large and has a very nice lookout to the ocean where you can see surfers.
The only thing that was a little bothering is wildlife. I am ok with geckos, but there were other not harmful but also not pretty insects that were probably coming from windows and it is better to keep your luggage closed so they don't travel with you :)
Overall, we enjoyed our experience and had a great time visiting Hilo! It is a beautiful city and the place is near everything we wanted to see.

Leigh was a great host, very welcoming and was responsive! Everything about her location was great. And of course cannot forget about the best part the view! I would definitely recommend this airbnb. Again mahalo 🌺🤙🏽

Likely the best View in Hilo.
Beautiful ocean view overlooking Honoli’i surf break.
The apartment was very clean, quiet and private.
Highly recommend.

Great place! Great host.
This is fun and happening area as well.

She was great. I was able to stay a little later than my checkout time to work last minute. Beautiful views. Love falling asleep to the sounds of the ocean. I felt very safe and comfortable. Thanks for the extras!
A house at the height of the description, a host full of attention. I highly recommend it.
We enjoyed watching the surfers and the sunset over the ocean. The apartment was comfortable and well equipped.
Cute and comfy airbnb. Beautiful views of Hilo beaches.

Absolute best place to stay in and around Hilo!
The View!!!!!! The pictures in the listing don’t do any justice, the view from the yard is just stunning. You wake up and fall asleep to the sound of the waves.
The place was super cozy and we felt right at home. Leigh actually rearranged the spot from what it looked like when we booked it and we couldn’t be happier with that decision. It was super roomy and gave us plenty space to relax.
Leigh was very responsive with any communication and had great tips for the surrounding area for restaurants and activities.
Would stay here again for sure ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
This place is beautiful and peaceful. Leigh is a wonderful host. Nice room with privacy. Would definitely recommend. The views are also phenomenal.
Leigh was lovely. Her place has a great view.
Comfortable and cozy, easy to get into Hilo or the many the sights out of town.
Cozy place, with a breathtaking view! I definitely recommend it.
Had a great stay in Hilo at Leigh’s place. Great location and amenities for our visit! Bidet was a perk haha :)

Leigh was a warm and friendly host. Our stay was relaxing and peaceful. The sunrise view was breathtakingly spectacular each morning! The bed was comfy and the space was enough room for the two of us during our short stay in Hilo.

Very nice basement Airbnb just north of Hilo. The unit was well equipped with a big fridge, dishes, disposable plates, corkscrew, etc. Bed was comfortable. Location is just north of town but a quick, scenic drive away and awesome cliff-side views. The shower takes a while to heat up and you might encounter a lizard or bug, but overall a great spot, good value, and Leigh was a super friendly and helpful host!

We had the pleasure of staying in this lovely Hilo apartment for a week, and we highly recommend it. The location is fantastic, with a beach a short walk away, and we enjoyed watching surfers during breakfast.The apartment is a gem, featuring a beautifully designed bathroom, a well-equipped kitchen (including a large fridge), and the option to grill, though we didn't use it.Our hostess was exceptionally kind and informative, enhancing our stay. Should we return to Hawaii, we'd choose this apartment again without hesitation. Thanks for an unforgettable experience!
Great stay!! Such a beautiful view and a wonderful host!

Wow what a nice view! We've never seen anything like it. We felt like at home and the bed was very comfy. This was our 3rd Airbnb in Hawaii and we slept by far the best. It was very pleasant to fall asleep with the waves and you could really darken the room. The coqui frogs were not very loud.
Unfortunately, we were only able to stay one night. We would definitely go back there but next time for a long time

Really cool location close to one of the few good surfing beaches on the island and close to shopping and dining in downtown Hilo! Leigh was super friendly and loaned us lots of great beach equipment. She even let us stay a little longer while we surfed! Thank you Leigh for a great trip!

It was sooo beautiful! Leigh was amazing! We genuinely felt like we were a part of the Hawaiian community. She and her family helped to bring the feel-good "aloha spirit" into our trip. It was always a pleasure to get home at night time to the great view of the beach (occasionally with people stoking fires in the distance). She treated us special and not like another number. It made us feel like we were special :D She had great local recommendations, and helped make the trip even better than it otherwise would've been!

This was my favorite stay so far on my trip to the big island. The property is BEAUTIFUL and you don’t even need to leave to have a great time enjoying the views. Super nice space Leigh has set up, had everything we needed, and we honestly didn’t want to leave at the end. Lots of coqui frogs at night which are nice to listen to, lizards outside, and rainy mornings. Can be a little humid but fan helps a ton (that’s just the area really). My partner and I loved it here and highly recommend.
Amazing veiws! Awesome hosts! Great location in Hilo!
Very good welcome from Leigh, whom I thank very much. The accommodation is very well arranged and the view is very beautiful. I enjoyed this place!

We love staying at Leigh’s place. She is always so welcoming and her hospitality is amazing! She had so much aloha spirit and hospitality, and always so sweet n communicates well! Her place is lovely and so peaceful and relaxing and easy to get places.

We had a wonderful time staying here! Host has thought of so many details to make this a comfortable and welcoming place to stay! We would definitely stay again! Everything was sparkling clean. Lots of attention to details (extra towels, beach towels, not a full kitchen but-microwave, refrigerator with water filter for cool water, toaster oven, pod-style coffee maker, access to borrow beach chairs, umbrella, cooler, etc.) We arrived during an especially warm and humid time. Although there is no built-in air conditioning, there was a portable unit and fan set up. Lots of windows with views and sounds of the ocean! Host was super clear with instructions and gave recommendations for local eateries, etc. Very responsive! Host lives upstairs and was ultra quiet! The only less than perfect things was privacy. There is no door separating the downstairs unit from the main house upstairs. However, it does go up to a switch back staircase. So, no one can see up or down. Still 5 stars!!!

This place is in such a cool location! We couldn’t get over how scenic it was. The sound of waves rolling and coqui frogs at night.
The layout of the room was cute and the shower was fully stocked.
We will be back soon for sure

Wowzers! Book this place while staying in Hilo! What a serene and peaceful view! So postcard worthy! We traveled to Hilo for a night and kicked ourselves immediately for not booking several nights! Leigh's place is adorable, and has everything you need (including parking!). Aside from being spotless and having the perfect view, Leigh's home sits on a quiet street and is a short drive to fun hotspots and restaurants. Both hosts-Leigh and Christine- were very responsive and friendly. We will gladly book again during our next visit to Hilo.

The pictures give this place no justice. It is beautiful. The view is breathtaking. You can hear the waves. The bed and pillows were super comfortable. Nice size fridge. Lots of amenities. Wifi worked great. The AC worked grear.
Cons: the were birds chirping for hours. Eventually the died out or we fell asleep before them 😂.
The water in the shower takes a while to get hot.
I would definitely come back and stay here.

Leigh is an amazing host! She is so sweet and has very great communication! Her place is fabulous and it’s so peaceful and relaxing while still close to everything. Her place is amazing and she is amazing!!!

This is our second stay at Leigh’s place while doing volunteer work nearby. Once again… the surroundings are so beautiful, bed is comfortable, place smells fresh, (which can be hard in Hilo due to the damp environment). Leigh goes out of her way to provide a Keurig and the coffee, plenty of towels, beach gear, umbrella for the occasional sprinkle. If you get a chance, go to the beach on the other side of the bridge (Honolii) and swim in the river for a crisp cool down (not the beach unless you really really really know what you are doing surf/ wave wise… not for anyone but experts). Somehow the TV remote was gone when we arrived… Leigh gave us her own! Talk about hospitality!! We will be staying again.

Leigh is a wonderful communicator. She was very attentive to our needs. When we had a small difficulty she fixed that situation very quickly. She went WAY above and beyond… So much so that we have booked to stay at her place again coming up very soon. Saw another reviewer mention ‘bugs’… there was not a one in sight. Very pest free…If your wondering. The bed is comfortable, the temperature inside is super comfortable with the ocean breeze (even a tiny bit chilly in the early morning). Super cute twin bed ‘loft’ up the stairs, to sleep three people. You can’t beat the view of Honolii beach. Great spot to just sit on the lawn chairs in the evening sipping you fav “drink” an catch your breath with the amazing panoramic view.

This stay was my all time favorite, Leigh is an incredible host to say she is accommodating is an understatement. To add she also is extremely friendly and kind. 10/10 host with a breathtaking view every morning. I will be recommending this airbnb and staying her in the future.

Beautiful view very much enjoyed it. The space wasn’t very clean I found lots of bugs coming in through the screens. The door to the entrance didn’t fit the frame to close properly so geckos and bugs would also come through there. Host was very friendly and easy to work with. Not much to cook with so plan to eat out mostly if you are staying here. Host has good recommendations for food and restaurants to check out.

Words can’t describe how wonderful Leigh’s place is. Inside had everything we needed. We fell asleep and woke up to the sounds of waves crashing and birds chirping. There were also chairs, boogie boards and beach towels available which was awesome to have available. We also made friends with their outdoor kitty. The views are so amazing and the location is convenient to everything. Wish we had stayed longer. 10/10 recommend!

The location on the cliff overlooking the surfing beach was awesome! We fell asleep and woke to the sound of waves crashing on the beach below. And got to watch the surfers while having our coffee in the yard each morning. Nice new shower and bathroom. Toaster oven, microwave, and fridge were all we needed. A cozy place to use as a base to explore the eastern island.

Leigh, was very helpful and friendly! Easy check in and quick responses! We had a later flight and checked in after dark in the evening and she was kind enough to leave all the outside lights on for us!
Cute little spot where you can watch surfers and listen to the rain! We would definitely stay again if ever in Hilo.
Super cute place, with awesome view of the beach below. Can also walk to a secluded waterfall. Close drive to restaurants and the farmers market. Leigh was a great host!
Wonderful location! Very peaceful and amazing views. Leigh is fantastic!!!
Cute, comfortable little spot right outside of Hilo. Leigh was extremely helpful with her local recommendations and local updates.

Leigh was super friendly and helpful regarding things to do in Hilo and recommending good restaurants. Her place is so beautiful and relaxing…we really enjoyed the view and the sound of the ocean. We would love to come back again!

Leigh was a great host. The location was amazing. One of my favorite things to do on the big island was to just sit in the lawn chair and soak in the surroundings.
The bed was comfortable and clean. The ocean view, breeze and sound was amazing from the room. Good windows and good for sleeping in.
Close to many great restaurants, snorkeling and water falls.
I highly recommend if you are on the big island.
Leigh is an excellent host! Very accommodating. Place was very relaxing and has a great view. Overall fun experience there. Will be looking forward to staying there again!

Mahalo nui Leigh for everything you done for me and my family. We had a great stay and mahalo again for your aloha and hospitality. You are AWESOME!!
Mahalo,
Mark, Kari, and Jayse

It’s a wonderful location, where is about seven-minutes drive to Hilo’s downtown area. The decorations of unit is beautiful and view is amazing. We enjoyed a great starry night at the lawn and sunrise. Also, Leigh was very friendly to show us the home and gave us tips. The instructions were clear, but it’s a little bit hard to find a direction at night. Generally, it’s a wonderful place to stay.

We had a wonderful stay and would definitely recommend the apartment! The view is just amazing, it was really clean and cozy. Leigh was super nice and helpful. Everything was even better than we‘ve imagined!

Great air bnb & would book again! The views here are astonishing. Enjoyed waking up each morning & watching the surfers & beautiful scenery. You feel right in nature & can fall asleep to frogs & wake up to birds chirping - so cool! Leigh is very friendly & helpful! She told us where to boogie board & where not to (when waves were too high). She also had beach equipment available (umbrella, chair, & 2 boogie boards) for us to borrow. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here.
super friendly. lovely view. great location. excellent place to begin our trip.
The view is even better than the photos!

We imagine that the place would be nice in warm months however in when we there it was cold and very rainy. The room smelled damp and the path to the room was dark and slippery.
Based on that and the fact there’s no kitchen facilities, I found the price quite high.
Otherwise am sure on warm bright days, the entrance could be left open and food could picked up to eat outdoors.

We were so excited about our stay at Leigh's place, but we unfortunately experienced unexpected travel changes. Leigh was so communicative, kind, and understanding of our situation. We are incredibly grateful! We highly recommend booking with Leigh, and we hope to stay at her place another time in the future!

Leigh was an exceptional host!! She was so sweet and so friendly, great communication, and her home was perfect for the two of us!There’s IMMACULATE views of the ocean right outside our room where my fiancé watched the surfers below as we drank our coffee and ate our breakfast. Her home is in a great location as well to food, Hilo farmers market, grocery stores, little shops… it was maybe 7 minutes away. When we walked into the airbnb the room smelled amazing and she had cute little fresh flowers. 100% will be renting with her again!
We had a wonderful stay at Leigh's! She took the time to take us to Kilauea for an evening and gave us lots of good recommendations for the Hilo area. Very responsive and easy to work with. 10/10

I recently had the pleasure of staying at an Airbnb in Hilo, Hawaii, and I must say that it was a truly wonderful experience. Our host was incredibly kind and welcoming, making us feel right at home from the moment we arrived. They went out of their way to make sure we had everything we needed, from providing us with detailed instructions about the property to offering recommendations for local restaurants.
I would also like to add that the view from the porch was breathtaking. The host had thoughtfully set up a seating area, so we could sit and admire the panoramic view of the surrounding lush greenery and the beautiful Pacific Ocean.
Overall, I would highly recommend this Airbnb and its host to anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay in Hilo. They truly embody the spirit of hospitality, and I would not hesitate to book with them again in the future. Thank you for a wonderful vacation!
Fabulous place to stay! Quaint and peaceful. The view, including watching the surfers, was just amazing. Hoping to book again on next trip to Big Island.

Leigh's place is nice and quaint. Perfect for a couple exploring the big island for a few days. The sounds of the frogs and waves crashing were a great way to fall asleep. The view of the surfers on the waves against the backdrop of the sunrise in the morning was an excellent way to start the day. No A/C was no problem, as the sea breeze through the open windows and the oscillating floor fan were sufficient. Leigh was responsive and friendly, I recommend her place! Thanks.
What a beautiful view from this Rental, so pretty day or night. I loved hearing the Ocean at night time. Leigh was a wonderful host and the place exceeded our expectations. Very nice.

Leigh was very nice and informative. Check in was easy, they had coffee and munchies available and the bed was comfortable. The view from the yard is incredible since it looks down over Honolii beach park. Great if you’re looking to check the surf in the morning. Great little crash pad but it lacked a some privacy. The bathroom didn’t have a door and there’s a staircase that leads upstairs into the main house, not sure if there’s a door there either. Other than that, I can’t complain. Very nice people in a clean place and right in the water. Aloha.

This place was fantastic. The views right outside your door are unbeatable. The hosts were the friendliest and incredibly easy to communicate with. One of the best air bnb’s I’ve ever stayed at. Will definitely be coming back here again!

I can’t say enough good things about Carrie’s place! The house was very very nice, on a beautiful property. While the stay is connected to their house, it still feels very private! Additionally, the house is located very close to the main part of Hilo making getting around super easy. Lastly, the hosts make FABULOUS recommendations. They left a binder of takeout menus from places close by and sent a few additional recommendations my way. During our stay, we tried quite a few of them and all of them were stellar. Highly, highly recommend staying here!
Great location, quite beautiful garden, Hilo bay view from hill top, everything clean, the host is nice, of course. It was very relaxing. Thank you!

Hugh and Carrie were great hosts. Super friendly, respectful and quick to respond. Their property is well maintained and quite beautiful. It’s close to all the sites of Hilo and a quick drive into town but far enough away to feel calm and quiet at night. Their property and hospitality made our trip to Hilo.

Carrie's place is wonderful. It's a great place to come back to after exploring the area around Hilo. Loved the lanai, with that beautiful view. So peaceful going to sleep to the sound of tree frogs and waking up to bird song. Highly recommend it.

Nestled in a private gated community on top of a hill that overlooks the Hilo bay. Can see wild pigs in the morning and hear coqui frogs at night. Peaceful location 10 mins away from downtown Hilo. Place felt very homey and has all the amenities you need to have a comfortable stay. Enjoyed chilling on the hammock on the lanai. Host was very responsive throughout our stay.

My family loved staying here. Quiet, beautiful, and serene, the nature is incredible. The place is pristine. Clean, well maintained and the pictures do not do it justice. Close to everything you would want to do in Hilo. Incredible place, incredible host. Next time In Hilo will 100% be staying here again.

This airbnb was cozy and very clean! Great location to downtown Hilo, although not walkable to downtown. You do need a car as it’s about a 5 min drive, very doable. We also never had any issues finding free street parking in downtown. We spent majority of our time in Hilo at the national park which was about 45-50 min away.
The airbnb had all the amenities you would need and we especially enjoyed the outdoor deck/hammock to look out at the bay. We spent our evenings watching movies on Netflix and hbo max, both provided by the host. They were also very responsive and answered our questions quickly
Great place to stay, sunrise in the hammock on the lanai didn’t disappoint
Relaxing, peaceful, lush landscaping, beautiful interior. Exactly as described. Would stay again if we get the chance to return to Hilo.
Beautiful and serine. Highly recommended especially if your looking to just relax and reset.Mahalo for sharing such a beautiful home away from home.

Best location in town.
Beautiful view!!
We love to come back Carrie’s place.

Amazing sunrise,.
We were given helpful information of the area (placed to enjoy)..
The location is perfect to venture off around the island from and / or wander into Hilo to learn of the island life.
We had slow, relaxing walks and long drives around the island.
Perfect base camp.
Fell in love with Hilo and this bnb. We’d stay here again in a heartbeat.

What a lovely place to stay! Everything was just perfect, and the condo was pristinely clean and beatifully appointed.
Carrie and Hugh were fantastic hosts -- Hugh even invited us up on their lanai of the main house for a bluegrass practice session with his band. AMAZING!
A terrific few days in Hilo ... thanks so very much!
Breathtaking views, beautiful island vibe, pristine inside stocked with everything, perfect location, and super sweet hosts!

Carrie's place is the perfect location if you're looking for a peaceful place to call home while you're exploring the eastern side of Big Island. From her place you're not more than an hour's drive to Volcano National Park, the northern valley, and only a 5 min drive to downtown Hilo and a few of the local swimming holes, beaches, restaurants, and the farmer's market. It was always a great feeling to be able to return home after a day out and just relax in the beautiful home, and also watch the sun rise over Hilo Bay from the awesome back deck. Can't say enough about this ABNB! Probably one of our best rentals yet! We would come back to the Hilo area just for the rental!

We loved this place. Mile or two out of Hilo with a nice view of the harbor, super peaceful. We thought it was the most well-appointed Airbnb we’ve ever stayed at. Everything is right where you need it and very thoughtful. Very clean and nicely decorated. Feels very new. Also feels very private.

Beautiful place!! Most amazing views of Hilo, peaceful setting, with great amenities. Clean, spacious interior with the comfiest bed. Big kitchen and grill outside. WIFI is very strong for those that need to work/have internet.
Carrie and Hugh are AMAZING hosts who make you feel right at home. This is a rare spot that is close to town and surfing while offering quiet relaxation. Not to mention the front porch views of sunrise and sunset after glow!! Truly one of a kind. And we can't wait to come back! Mahalo for an amazing time!

The view and seclusion of this property are amazing. Porch hammock at night listening to the breeze and frogs couldn’t be beat. Decor is very nice and everything was clean. Very short drive to downtown Hilo. Appreciate Carrie’s flexibility and recommendations.

Our stay went fantastic from check in to check out. The communication with the hosts was perfect and timely. We had our own space and the view was amazing. We had hoped for a place within walking distance to town but this wasn’t the place. Not the fault at all of the hosts, just wish this would have been closer to town, but then again you’d most likely give up the luxury of this type of space. Overall I’d recommend this space for a Hilo stay. Thanks Carrie and Hugh. Appreciate the hospitality.

Our stay could not have been better. The in home apartment is absolutely beautiful, artfully decorated, with complete privacy. We had everything we needed - boogie boards, chairs, even a little cooler to pack a lunch. The view over the bay was priceless. Carrie is a great host, always responding quickly to our questions. Spectacular!

Lovely location and beautiful indoor and outdoor space. Super comfortable, clean and stylish. The hosts were very welcoming and we really appreciated the tour of their tropical garden. It was a very enjoyable stay in Hilo.

Beautiful, peaceful place. Hugh and Carrie were fantastic hosts! One of my favorite airbnbs I've stayed at. Everything you could need is provided, and they also gave some tasty fruits grown from their own yard.

Carrie and Hugh were excellent host! They welcomed us with a bottle of wine and fresh fruits. You will get a breathtaking view, you can see the ocean from the living room. I loved the hammock in the patio. The host provided all the mentioned amenities. The place was nice and tidy. I highly recommend this place.
This was an absolutely wonderful stay! Such a beautiful place with an amazing view and location. We were exceedingly happy with our choice to stay here and couldn’t recommend it more.

This was our first time staying in Hilo and Carrie’s place met all of our expectations. Super clean, modern, peaceful and great views , especially waking up to the sight of the sunrise out the front door. Carrie’s property is filled with many native fruit trees and plants. This gives such an awesome feel to the property. I would highly recommend staying here and we would again.

This was one of the most beautiful and peaceful places we’ve ever stayed. Sitting on the porch in the afternoons looking over the water, it was just stunning. I don’t know when we’ll get back to Hawaii, but there’s no other place I’d rather stay when we do.

We had a wonderful time staying at this beautiful place in Hilo! It truly felt like living like a local, with beautiful views and excellent proximity to beaches and the center of town. Highly recommend!
Beautiful place to stay while visiting Hilo for a few days. The grounds and view were amazing and the home was clean, beautiful and comfortable. We would stay here again.

This was the best stay we had of four different places over two weeks in Hawaii. It's perfect if you are looking for a low-key vibe where you can chill. It had a 5 star quality in terms of the beauty of the view, the fresh fruit - their yard was amazing as well as the view of the Bay!
They were also very flexible with us on check-in and check-out which was greatly appreciated. Overall, it was just a perfect stay and a perfect place. If we can go back to the big island, we'll definitely book to stay here again!

Great stay!The hosts lived next door and welcomed us warmly and provided a lot of useful information.The view of the house is particularly beautiful, there is a big lawn in front of the door, and the sea can be seen in the distance.A few minutes drive from the town center, conveniently located!

A fantastic location with a beautiful view over the bay. The hosts are especially accommodating and responsive. Whenever there was an issue it was resolved quickly and in friendly fashion. Will look for this one whenever i come back.
We loved our stay. The location was just outside of the main Hilo area and absolutely beautiful, with a lovely view. The Airbnb was comfortable and had all the amenities we needed. Highly recommend!

My stay at Carrie's was very nice!
The place was clean and as described. The terrace, the very well-maintained garden and the view of the Bay of Hilo greatly contributed to all these good times.
I would definitely recommend this apartment and would definitely come back if it wasn't so far from France… 😊
A peaceful place near a fun surf and swim spot! Great for relaxing.

This was the cleanest, newest place I’ve ever stayed at. Hosts were fantastic and friendly. Harold and Jane(parents) gave us great tips on seeing the volcano and other things to do. Volcano at night is the best.

Carrie provided exceptional directions and check-in instructions to her home made our arrival smooth as silk. Carrie's place was cozy and comfortable. The kitchen and bathroom were truly one of the best at any other Air b and b. The large bay window in the bedroom provided a nice view into the beautiful gardens. We had the added benefit of interacting with Jane and Harold, who live on the property, who were both extremely lovely, inviting, and helpful. We would definitely stay at Carrie's place again the next time we visit Hilo.

It is a great space surrounded by an amazing garden, away from noise (except for the frogs) but very close to Hilo. 100% recommended to see the volcanoes national park and Mauna Kea. The owners Harold and his wife are great and super hospitable. Easy parking if you go by car. A/C and fans, full kitchen, barbecue.
Great hosts and appreciated the fruit!
Great view of the Hilo bay from the property, which is located in a quiet and safe neighbourhood. Really enjoyed the stay :)

Carrieʻs place was a great place for a few days in Hilo, a couple of minutes from bay front but also a great starting point for exploring the Hamakua coast. Having a day bed and lanai were great ways to spend the mornings and evenings overlooking Hilo bay in peaceful surrounding. Additionally, the full-sized fridge, sink, and microwave were very helpful when traveling with an infant and toddler. Would highly recommend staying here!

The condo was spacious and comfy, clean, with a classic style. Seems to have been renovated recently. Had an amazing porch with a beautiful well maintained back yard. Close enough to town to be convenient and far enough to feel relaxing. Host was communicative and friendly. Both check in and check out instructions were simple and straight forward, no bible length house manual, no laundry list of cleaning either, which I personally appreciated. Has 2 AC units that worked great. It’s attached to the owner’s home, although I never saw anyone & felt privacy. It does not have a full kitchen, but It does however have a full size fridge, microwave, basic utensils just no stove. Would suggest to add seasonings & oil. Overall I did enjoy my stay. The only truly negative for me was that the curtains in both the bedroom and living room did not fully close due to the ACs, if you are a light sleeper like me, and need completely dark rooms to sleep in, that might be something to take into account.
Great location in Hilo and a beautiful place with a gorgeous view. Super clean and cozy! We loved our stay here and would do it again!

We live in apartment in big city so we’ve always wanted to live in a house with a big yard and beautiful view. This dream has come true thanks to this house. Big island is an amazing place and it’s great to have a quiet and beautiful place to go back to after a long day. It’s about 3 miles from Safeway, target and lots of other supermarkets. Carrie her family are super nice and helpful! I love their cat kitty very much!
Carrie’s place was absolutely pristine, gorgeous, comfortable! Super private and relaxing. Close to downtown Hilo and the water!

Great stay in a a peaceful atmosphere that is located close to everything you'd like to see in Hilo. We had everything we needed and I enjoyed being able to grill food instead of a traditional stove. Hugh was able to greet us and made us feel right at home. We are very grateful for our stay there. The pictures are accurate and the place was clean.
It was such a beautiful place. Amazing view. Close to Hilo. Lovely porch. The accommodations were wonderful.
The house was great. Very clean and nice. Flowers and fruit a nice touch. Very quiet. Nice view. Easy check-in and check-out. I would stay here again.
Absolutely fabulous, planning my next trip back!
Paradise in Hilo! We loved our stay, thank you so so much!
The house is really nice and well-kept, the garden and lanai are very nice. Carrie and her husband were very kind and friendly in providing us with information about Hilo.

It was perfect for us, so quiet and in a beautiful setting yet easily accessible to town. So many windows gave great light. We had a sunrise every morning from the lanai. The place was very clean and comfortable for 2 adults although the day bed and crib could accommodate a small family.
Fresh fruit and wine made us feel welcome and the flowers in every room were a lovely touch.
We loved the town of Hilo, quirky but with some great history. Carrie kept in touch with us to make sure we had everything we needed. We will remember our time in Hilo fondly.
We had a great stay. We loved the space and the location, a perfect getaway close to town and local attractions, but plenty of peace and quiet.

Pure slice of heaven is here! I loved the space so much, I’ve been island hopping and this was the best place we stayed for sure! Truly a gem 💎 loved the privacy and beautiful nature views. Oh I wish I could live there!! Everything was as described, I was planning on doing laundry but was out too much so I didn’t utilize that. We did borrow the snorkeling gear which was super nice at two-step beach! :)
We stayed here for the Merrie Monarch Festival and it was the perfect location being only 10 minutes from all the events and activities. t’s exactly like the pictures and as described. Loved it!!
One of the best locations at Hilo!!

Carrie’s place is in a very quiet and nice neighborhood and it is close to down town Hilo as well. The place is clean and has everything we needed. They also let us do laundry there. Carrie is super responsive. She always replies to my text within two minutes.

Hugh and Carrie’s place was awesome!! Beautiful place with a view of the bay. Hugh gave us great recommendations on local restaurants and things to do. It was quiet and very conveniently located to get to town and to a local surf beach. Overall one of the best Airbnb’s we’ve stayed in! Also lovely touches with the flowers, wine and fruit.
Had a very relaxing and peaceful stay here. Watched the sun rise over the bay from the pretty lanai while sipping some coffee. Great location just outside of town.

Carrie's place is the perfect balance between city conveniences and rural beauty. The view from the patio is outstanding as you are at higher elevation and have a very big view of Hilo's waterfront. The night sky is spectacular because you are above the city lights. The interior of the place if beautiful and it's a great place to just relax after a day of biking, snorkeling, going to waterfalls, or many other outdoor pursuits which are close by. This was the best place by far we stayed at on our three week trip to Hawaii.

Clean. Place was as it described and looks like photos. Beautiful view of Hilo bay. Peaceful (what we like), relaxing. My daughter enjoyed the yard and hammock. Location was right outside of Hilo town, but still close to a lot of places, beaches. My husband got to surf, was able to borrowed a board (thank you!), definitely made his day. We enjoyed staying at Carrie's place! Overall great place and location!

Had a great stay at this beautiful airbnb right outside of Hilo. Very private with a nice view of the bay. Hugh had lots of Aloha and was very accommodating. Always responsive if I needed anything. The welcoming fruit basket was a nice touch. Hope to be back!

Carrie’s place is better than the pictures. Wonderful sunrises and view of Hilo bay. Great landscaping with lots of fruit trees. Short drive to downtown, but quiet neighborhood good for walking. Walking distance to nice, small black beach and pretty walk/drive on little used road through gorgeous terrain including waterfalls. Best of all, Carrie and her husband are terrific hosts.
A++ host. Great accommodations and the surrounding area.. highly recommended
We are very satisfied with staying at Carrie's place. Great location overseeing Hilo bay. The host is very friendly. The room is spacious for us.

We were absolutely blown away by the views, the garden, the deck, the neighborhood, and the quality of the apartment. We were holed up there with our infant and it was amazingly comfortable. We loved watching the sunrise from the hammock every morning, cooking on the grill every night, and enjoying the super thoughtful fruit basket harvested from their impressive yard :)
Great

Very spacious and well appointed. Awesome froggy chorus in the evening, and nice sunrises from the lanai in the morning. Large, well maintained property in a private neighborhood, minutes away from a local black sand surf beach. Showers every night, but mostly clear and sunny during the days.

Working from Paradise! We booked a week on the Big Island intending to work full days on mainland time and then get out to see the sights during the afternoons. As it turned out, I was so swamped with work, we didn't leave the property for days at a time. Thankfully, the house is so nice and peaceful, perfectly located on a hill with views above Hilo Bay, large grounds with fruit trees, and frog serenades at night, that I couldn't have asked for more from a work-from-home set up. Key point for us - the internet was strong and reliable, with two of us running video calls simultaneously. We ate most of our meals at home, cooking on the BBQ on the excellent lanai (with hammock!). When we did manage to make it off the property, we popped down into Hilo Town to enjoy the great local restaurants and shops. The location is perfect for reaching the whole windward side of the island, and the hosts are the best hosts I've ever had!

This is hands-down one of the best Airbnbs I've stayed at! Carrie's place is clean, comfortable, and spacious. The space was new with quality furnishing, it felt like being a guest rather than renting a room. It was a treat, and I hope to be back.
Carrie and Hugh are great host and very easy to communicate with. Great location with a stunning view on the Hilo Bay and beautiful sunrise. The rental is super clean with a lots of natural lights.

Carrie and Hughes place is absolutely beautiful and was completely spotless upon arrival. Has all the necessities for a comfortable stay and a great entertainment setup (Netflix, Hulu, HBO, Disney and more). There’s a great view from the lanai and the surrounding neighbourhood is very peaceful and safe. Would love to stay again if we find ourselves in Hilo. Will note for anyone staying that it’s about a half hour walk into Hilo downtown and there isn’t much street lighting, so would recommend a car for anyone staying here or in Hilo in general. Would also note, in case it’s not apparent from the photos that the space is located downstairs from the main house, but was still very private and quiet.

This is the kind of stay that we wish they all could be. The place over-delivers on it's promise - bigger and more beautiful than the pictures can capture. And it's managed by hosts who are smart, thoughtful and friendly! If you've fully read the description and you like what you've read and what you see in the photos, you should probably book now, before it gets snapped-up - it's all entirely accurate. Great location for accessing Hilo - and being able to retreat to peace and quiet whenever you like for a wind-down in comfort and style.

Beautiful, quiet place to relax and recharge for Big Island adventures! Home is super nice with great Hawaiian wood features throughout. Awesome deck to watch sunrise, Hilo bay, and flights coming and going. Super nice hosts to top it off!

We really enjoyed our stay here. very clean, private, true to the photos and description. Super close to downtown Hilo but far enough away to feel like you are out in the country. One thing to note, if you have 3 people/are planning to use the daybed on the living room, there are no curtains and it gets light early!
Excellent location that is close to fun activities and good food, but outside of town for some peace and quiet. The place is comfortable and clean! We loved it!

This was the best AirBnB experience I’ve ever had. The place is so comfortable. There is a hammock on the porch where you can sit and watch birds. There’s a great view. The location is very cool. It’s even visible from postcards of Hilo. Anyway, 10/10. Great place.

We did a two week island hopping trip across several islands and this place was by far the best and most enjoyable stay during our journey. The house, garden and neighborhood is super well maintained and lovely. The condo is equipped with literally everything you would need, but note that there is no oven/stove. A microwave is available though. The whole family was super helpful and really kind. The cat was very friendly and visited us to hang out a bit.
Overall we really enjoyed our stay and would recommend it anytime.

This Airbnb was the best spot we stayed at on our trip to Hawaii. The view is beautiful, there is so much space and the neighborhood is quiet. It is also a short drive away from the city center. The hosts were also very accommodating and easy to reach. Would definitely stay here again if we come to Hilo!

Gorgeous, clean, and relaxing! We loved our stay here. Carrie responded quickly when we had questions, we were able to do some laundry while we stayed, and checkin/checkout was so smooth. I love that the Airbnb came with beach chairs, towels, and snorkels for instant beach fun. Highly recommend this place if you’re looking for a stay on the big island!

We had a very pleasant stay and loved everything about Carrie's place! The cleanness, the comfort, the amenities, the decorations, the view, the location... I can go on and on. Carrie really thought of everything to give guests a great experience, and the amenities can almost match a fancy hotel. The guesthouse is located on a beautiful property with a huge backyard planted with different species such as a pineapple plant! We also enjoyed the hammock on the lanai and Carrie's friendly cat who greeted us every time we returned to the house.

It’s a beautiful home with some amazing views from the hill, where you can spot a sunrise right from the deck.
We really enjoyed the homey touches , soft towels and privacy.
Check in instructions were simple and clear.
I would recommend to anyone who is staying in Hilo, and looking for a great retreat spot. By the way the home is located in a perfect location!!!
Mahalo Carrie
Wonderful stay, such kind and generous hosts. We would stay again!
Perfect place to stay in Hilo. Great location looking over the bay. Everything is a describe. Very friendly and welcoming.

An absolutely wonderful place to stay. The space was private, very well adorned, spacious, and beautiful. Carrie and Hugh were wonderful hosts -- very accommodating and generous with suggestions (and with giving us privacy). The space is spacious and very comfortable, with a great porch and hammock perfect for taking in the bay. Very close to the main areas of Hilo. Can't say enough good things -- one of our favorite stays. Highly recommended!

We’ve had the pleasure of staying at this rental twice now and both times we absolutely loved it! Its beautifully decorated, extremely clean and has everything you’ll need for a comfortable stay. It’s in a private gated community and is very peaceful. The view is an added bonus and is so pretty. The Hosts Carrie & Hugh are very helpful and knowledgeable about the area. They’re quick to respond to any questions and make you feel right at home. We wish we could have stayed longer!

Awesome multi-day stay in a beautiful property surrounded by nature! Carrie & Hugh were incredible hosts. Terrific location, central to numerous points of interest. Would absolutely love to stay here again in the future!

Lovely one bedroom guest house in Hilo, HI. Very private, well maintained and had everything we needed to make our stay perfection. Although, we didn’t get a chance to meet our hosts, Carrie and Hugh, we did have contact with them through texting. The house sitter, Ana, was here to answer our questions and provide anything we needed. Thank you for a very enjoyable stay.

This was my fourth stay on the Big Island, and as long as it is available I won’t stay anywhere else on my future trips. Such a serene setting with an amazing view just a few short minutes from Hilo town. Nicely appointed, plenty of space, great deck with seating and a nice hammock. Easy access to Akaka Falls, the Botanical Gardens, and just 45 minutes up the mountain to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. We were even able to have restaurant food delivered when we were too tired to go out to eat. Absolutely nothing to complain about. Thanks so much.

We has a wonderful stay at Carrie and Hugh's home in Hilo. The space was perfect for our family. My kids, wife and I enjoyed the morning sunrises in the hammock, and running through their big beautiful garden.
The home is perfectly situated in a quiet part less than 5 min north of Hilo. It was the perfect jumping off point for enjoying the beaches, hiking in the national park, and exploring the Island.
The hosts offer great advice about things to do and places to eat tailored to your specific needs.
We would definitely stay at Carrie and Hugh's again if we come back to Hilo!
Awesome Airbnb. Hosts were very friendly and helpful. The location is beautiful and convenient. There’s also a cool local boogie boarding / surf spot really close by.
Carrie and Hugh couldn’t have been nicer. Their property is gorgeous and the Airbnb is great. Super close to Hilo too!
It is a marvelous place, lush and exotic. The sunrise gleaming through offshore cumulus is sublime.

Three of us stayed at Hugh and Carrie’s beautiful home which is in the gated community. The view of the bay was amazing! The place was very comfortable and spacious. Just know there is no stove top to cook a meal. It was described so but l just assumed there would be after buying ingredients for breakfast. There is a microwave. So, I learned to make poached eggs in it! No problem! Just one thing I wish they provided would be some essential seasonings such as salt & pepper since we the renters don’t need big salt & pepper shakers during our trip. They were very quick to respond. The bathroom was gorgeous! Highly recommend!
Carrie and Hugh were excellent and accommodating hosts. Would rent again!

Nothing but good things to say about our stay here! We loved a peaceful sunrise and coffee every morning. The location is perfect and the apartment is beautifully and thoughtfully furnished. Beware, if you stay here you will never want to leave!!!

The spacious sunny unit is thoughtfully furnished and was perfect for us. We enjoyed the morning sun and views on the porch and hanging out there later in the day after sightseeing. Carrie and Hugh are super nice hosts and have wealth of knowledge on the area. The setting is quiet, yet only a few minutes drive into Hilo.
Great place with incredible views. Carrie and Hugh are exceptionally nice and helpful.

Hilo sunrises from the patio are the calmest wonder. Carrie & her husband are highly responsive and offered great local foodie spots.
The location makes it easy to hike all the nearby falls and a commuters drive to Volcano.....that’s if you can escape the time machine hammock on the patio ;)
Mahalo nui loa iā ‘oe

We had a wonderful experience here! The location is absolutely phenomenal and it overlooks Hilo Bay. Absolutely sparkling clean inside with updated modern decor. Had everything you needed from the kitchen to the bathroom. TV and Wi-Fi set up we’re very nice. The lanai is gorgeous and the hammock was a nice touch.
We were greeted upon arrival and given a tour of the house. They were very receptive to communication and our timing. Can’t imagine a better place to stay in Hilo. Thank you so much for everything.
Carrie’s place was amazing. The views, decor, and all the extras touches were so appreciated. Perfect place to stay will be back.

Great place to stay and comfortably enough for our family of 3 (2 adults and a 4 year old). It is a few minutes outside of town in a quiet neighborhood. Hugh was very helpful and explained where everything was. No stovetop, which wasn't a big deal as we only booked 2 nights. Bring microwavable food, or head into town for some great restaurant options. Would stay again when in Hilo.
I am recommending this B&B

This place exceeded all expectations - it's in the perfect location so close to everything yet is so quiet and serene. The views are gorgeous; I loved the moments on the lanai. It feels very private yet Carrie & Hugh are always available and super responsive. I highly recommend!

Carrie is a truly lovely host who provides lots of extras in the apartment to make the stay comfortable. It is in a new house, tastefully furnished, with restful views over the bay and up Mauna Loa. The queen bed in the bedroom is the most comfortable I've ever slept on. The couch bed in the living room is also pleasant and gets the morning sun.

The house was absolutely great! Waking up in the morning and lying on the hammock with that view of the water was unbelievably nice. They had all kinds of suggestions for places we should see as well. Will absolutely stay again if I come back to big island.
Great view.
We loved our stay here. Hosts are super friendly with helpful tips about the area. The place is exactly as described if not better. Would highly recommend!!
Spacious and super clean space. The rental is very convenient to town in a quiet, safe neighborhood. Would highly recommend.
We loved staying at Carrie's place. It was very clean and well located for our discovery trips outside of Hilo, yet close enough to downtown for evening dining. We would be happy to come back.

We loved our stay at Carrie and Hugh’s place. The location was great, as it was just outside Hilo, and it also had beautiful views outside each window. Sunrise over hilo Bay on the lanai was a special treat. The decor was lovely - granite and beautiful wood - and the furniture and bed were very comfortable. Carrie and Hugh were available to answer questions if we needed, but mostly we felt like we had our own private residence. We are planning to return!

After a busy couple days in Kona, I felt very fortunate to land at Carrie’s place in Hilo. It was very cozy, clean, and comfortable. I honestly had a hard time getting motivated to do things sometimes because it was so welcoming with beautiful views of the ocean and lots of nature sounds.

The view is so pretty. Sitting on the lanai and watching the morning sun rise will fill one up with peace and tranquility. The amenities offered are plentiful and thoughtful. The location is minutes away from downtown. Overall, the house is gorgeous, very clean, quiet and situated on a serene location. Carrie is quick to respond and they offered many local tips to help us get the most out of our journey.

Hugh & Carrie’s is just outside of Hilo, on the north part of town. The area offers great views over the Hilo Bay from the lānai, which is breezy and a great spot to watch the sun come up in the morning. All amenities at the property were well kept, and looked after by the owners who are not far away if you need them. We can’t fault anything about our stay, as the hosts were warm and welcoming, which is what we prefer as a little human interaction and personal feel goes a long way for us!

Very private and the location was great. Close to town and close to an awesome surfing spot. Did not disappoint. Communication was always quick and they were very helpful when I needed something. I hope I'm able to return someday, and soon.
Thank you for a great stay . Loved it.
Fantastic space! Comfortable, clean, and under 5 minutes from downtown Hilo. Carrie and Hugh were extremely welcoming and friendly, and we would absolutely stay here again!

The apartment is fantastically located in the countryside. The veranda invites you to spend beautiful hours there.
There were three of us and it was completely sufficient.
There was no stove, but there was a microwave and nice dishes.
A large fridge was available.
The hosts are very friendly and strive to ensure a nice stay.
It was nice that there was no carpet, as usual in the United States. This makes it nice clean living.
We would like to thank you for the bottle of wine. We enjoyed these at the sunset.
Sparkling clean, great view, great host and little away from the Hilo downtown to have a quiet environment, but close enough to reach. It's also very close to a beach full of surfers.
Fantastic property!

Beautiful, lovingly and very thoughtfully furnished apartment with plenty of space and beautiful corners to settle in comfortably.
Carrie and Hugh are very accommodating hosts who do everything they can to make the stay as pleasant as possible.
Thank you!
What a stay! My parents who never use Airbnb loved it! I will certainly recommend a stay here!

Carrie's place is the perfect spot to explore Hilo as well as the rest of the Big Island! The location can't be beat as it's a quick drive up the road from Hilo, so you get the peace and quiet of being out of town, but can get into Hilo very quickly for fun, food, and anything you need. Carrie and Hugh were very kind and welcoming and their place was spotless. Check-in was very simple and it was great getting to know Carrie, Hugh, and their place. We highly recommend this place and would stay here again on any future adventures to Hilo!
Great value , you get a lot for the cost , best location ,
Carrie and Hugh's place was great and the view was amazing from the Lanai. We felt right at home and would definitely come back and stay longer.

Carrie's place is exactly as described, absolutely gorgeous, peaceful and serene, with beautiful views of Hilo Bay. It's far enough out of town to feel like you're a world away from quaint downtown Hilo, yet it's only a short drive away for all its conveniences. Carrie and Hugh are warm and welcoming, and have great local tips to share. Carrie left gardenias, wine and fruit for me--such thoughtful touches to an already perfect place. I'll be back for sure!
Again a very nice place to stay while in Hilo. Well decorated and cared for. Wonderful view of the bay and oh so quiet when you need a good nights rest. Hosts are friendly and always helpful.

Carrie’s place is a wonderful space - very close to all the restaurants and sights in Hilo. It’s very thoughtfully decorated and had all the amenities we needed for a very comfortable stay. Hugh and Carrie were friendly, helpful hosts, but gave us all the space and privacy we needed. We hope to be back on the Big Island soon, and would definitely return to this wonderful space in the future! Don’t hesitate to book!

This is a top quality, 5-star experience - high ceilings, stunning views, private entrance, natural wood everywhere, granite/tile bathroom. A serene and natural environment that is a pleasure to wake up in. Carrie and Hugh are available but not intrusive and the welcome with fresh papaya, lemons, bananas, wine and fresh flowers was perfect. The home is perfectly situated on a rise overlooking Hilo bay but also with an incredible view of Mauna Kea and Mauna Loa. You can get to Hilo town in 5 minutes but don’t have to deal with tour buses and exhaust. I highly recommend it!

Carries place is beautiful and serene. Lots of area between neighbors, area is quiet and peaceful overlooking Hilo Bay. Carrie is very attentive and helpful, goes the extra mile. Communication is great and we would recommend her place to all our friends and guests.
Fantastic stay, my partner and I are extremely satisfied with our stay at here! Highly suggest to take a jogging in the morning. The air is fresh, and the people are nice!
Beautiful view and space and wonderful host!

What a wonderful place. We especially loved lounging in the hammock on the lanai while enjoying the view, and chatting with Carrie and Hugh, who are lovely and great hosts. It's a great location, close to downtown Hilo and a nearby beach, but feels far away. The space itself is beautiful, more than enough for 2 people. We'll come back next time we're in Hilo!

When I arrived, I was surprised because it was too dark.
And I heard all the sounds because it was connected to the owner's house. But the next morning when I woke up, the view in front of me was so beautiful. It was nice to feel delicate and kind. This was the most wonderful place to visit in Hawaii.

This is a beautiful home (inside and out) in an ideal location. The views are amazing, and it’s just up the road from a fantastic beach. Carrie and Hugh were amazing hosts; kind, communicative and very helpful! Plenty of tips on beaches, and areas to surf/hike. This AirBNb really made our vacation - I will definitely book it again!

Carrie and Hugh were warm and welcoming throughout the process. They were always prompt with their responses and very helpful in getting us oriented. Their home is *lovely*; located on a beautiful spot with views of the bay, and in close proximity to everything. There are small but lovely touches throughout which will make anyone's stay comfortable. We also got a lot of privacy; they strike the balance perfectly between being available and giving you your own space. We'd strongly recommend this place as your hub while on the Hilo side and hope to visit it again someday soon!

Carrie and Hugh are amazingly welcoming hosts! Not only did they await us when we arrived but had also fruits and wine prepared for us.
The apartment is very stylish and there couldn’t be a better place to greet the sun in the morning than their wonderful lanai in the middle of nature overlooking Hilo bay!
Great location to explore various places of Big Island, can only recommend staying there!
Really comfortable place, Hugh and Carrie are very thoughtful.
Beautiful space with a beautiful view! Carrie and Hugh were so warm and made us feel comfortable right away, great hosts!
Carrie was a fantastic host - super helpful and available. The place was immaculate, amazing location and made you feel like you were in your own home and owned the sunrise!

Wonderful, responsive host. The unit is part of a newly built home, and is comfortable and stylish. Very close to Hilo yet a bit out of the city, surrounded in green and with a view of the bay. Loved it!
So modern and clean! It’s a very relaxing location too. Great view of Hilo and the break water. Close enough for accessibility, far enough for seclusion!

An outstanding apartment just a couple of minutes north of Hilo. Awesome hammock on the covered deck to relax in while feeling the cool breeze roll in off of Hilo bay. Very clean and modern. Make sure you follow Carrie's directions to the house as Google maps got us close, but not quite there.
Carrie was an awesome host! Her house is beautiful!!

Carrie and Hugh were the best hosts. Informational, hospitable, and respectful of privacy. The location is perfect - close enough to town but far enough to feel that you’re in the country. Fall asleep to the sound of coquí frogs and wake up to the birds and roosters. Beautiful new apartment, full sized fridge, great lanai overlooking the Hilo Bay, with plenty of space to relax and unwind. We WILL be back. Don’t hesitate, book this place NOW!!!
Carrie's place is beautiful and she is a wonderful host! Appreciate the hospitality and the attention to detail applied to their home

Carrie and Hugh are incredible hosts. We can highly recommend a stay with you. The view is beautiful and the in-law apartment very spacious and clean. The ideal location for excursions on the Hilo side of the island. We would book again immediately!

We loved staying at this place. Wonderful hostess, very hospitable and helpful. We couldn't wish for a better place to stay. This place is very private, beautiful views of the bay. It is very new and updated. The location is in perfect distance from downtown Hilo and very close to Aka Aka falls and Rainforest Botanical Garden. Carrie even left us exotic, local fresh fruit to taste (papaya, passion fruit and lychee. We didn't want to leave. It is a must place to stay.A++++++++++

Loved this place! Beautiful, new, clean, private, and safe. We felt like we struck gold -- and so fortunate to have stumbled upon it. Carrie was a great host, very accessible and responsive. Location was great - minutes from downtown yet felt like you're on a country estate. Best moment: sipping my morning coffee on the deck, while listening to the birds chirping... can't get much better than that!

Great place to stay while in Hilo. We used to live in Hilo and know t the area well and the location does not get much better. Peace and quite yet minutes from town. Very clean and nice. Carrie and Hugh were great hosts! I highly recommend staying here.
Great spot for the weekend. My son had a baseball tournament for the weekend and it was just what we were looking for . Would definitely recommend to others if they are planning a trip to Hilo .

The Ohana house is a comfy, serene place to get away from the hustle and bustle of city sounds. The only sounds you’ll wake up to are chickens, cows, frogs, birds, and other animals. The studio apartment was very clean with all the basics (except for laundry, which is noted in the description) and had lots of natural light. Island breezes and a ceiling fan meant no air conditioning needed. The large wrap-around lanai allowed awesome views all the way to the ocean. We had a great stay and would recommend to anyone looking to stay in the Hilo area.

Heather was an excellent host, she always responded to your time messages and helped facilitate us a little cooler for our 3 days.
The property is beautiful, surrounded by nature and as the publication says you will wake up with the rooster song and the birds around. The chickens are the most since they have their routine every morning and I even did a video with them. Love this place and very flexible to all destinations. Hilo is beautiful and this place is a faithful representation of what you see on the Island .
Thank you Thank you
Reviví my memories about my Natal Country.
We had a wonderful time in a wonderful room. Thank you very much.

The whole studio apartment is yours, so it is very private. The unit is spacious and comfortable. It is located upstairs making the views from the deck impressive. The large deck comes with a table and chairs for outside dining. My only regret was that we only booked 2 nights.
we loved our stay at Ohana guest house. The views are beautiful. Loved the fresh tangerines and grapefruit right off the trees.
Such a beautiful space to stay for the week. I was supposed to be in Hilo for a training but it got cancelled last minute. I was so glad I chose this peaceful place. I wish I could’ve stayed longer!

We had an excellent stay at Heather’s place. The accommodations and property were above and beyond our expectations! It was bigger and more private than we expected. The property was so peaceful and beautiful. We would definitely stay there again. We greatly appreciated her book of helpful suggestions of things to do, places to shop, and restaurants that were recommended. It was very well thought out and helpful. You can tell she pays attention to even the smallest details. She is very friendly and our vacation at her place was our favorite on the island.

Place was exactly as described and closer to the university than I expected. Nera looked and sounded intimidating at first, but she is so incredibly sweet. The chickens that followed us to the gate everyday was fun, and the rabbit was a surprise. It was a great few days.
Heather has a lovely home and it is so tranquil and lovely!

Terrific place, accurately listed. Was greeted by a friendly fluffy bunny the first night and enjoyed sounds of nature through the stay. Place had lots of room and temperature was enjoyable even without heat or AC for a February visit. Beautiful surroundings and friendly place!

Wonderful place to stay when travelling to Big Island. We really enjoyed our stay, BEST location of our 2 week Hawai'i trip. If you're planning to stay in Big Island, 100% reccomended. I would stay again if I return to Big Island. It has all the amenities you need to feel like home. Heather was very welcoming and agreat host.

Great property in the counrty side. we stayed for a week with our 2 teenage girls and the space was perfect. Lots of room and a beautiful deck area to enjoy. We will look to book again if we come back to the Big Island

Great place to stay. Beautiful location out in the country, but still close enough to town. Place was very clean, check-in/check-out was easy, and Heather was always quick to respond. Just a heads up, you'll hear nature sounds around you, especially roosters in the morning. Overall, highly recommended!

We had a wonderful stay at Heather’s place! What an oasis just outside of Hilo. The space is very comfortable and the lanai is fantastic. The kitchen offered a great mix of gadgets for some self-catering (we enjoyed making waffles with the waffle maker) and the beds were very comfortable. Heather was also very flexible with check in and check out times, which we really appreciated. Would love to stay there again.

I don't normally write reviews - but this place was worth it.
It's a tranquil home situated a bit outside the city, but you have a car anyways when visiting the Big Island. The bed was comfortable, the kitchen is adequate, and the views from the deck are what your soul needs.
When booking in Hilo, so many reviewers complain about the sound of nature when sleeping - I can assure you, this place has sounds of nature, but they are what you want. It is an experience that you will want, especially if you're visiting the Big Island from the gates of suburbia. Embrace the sound, smell, and sights - book this place and go enjoy the outdoors.
The hosts were very understanding as well.
Chris and Heathers house was perfect for me and my bfs short vacation. They were very friendly and helpful. The view was amazing. 10/10 recommend.

We really enjoyed staying at the Cozy Country Ohana House. The place was clean, had an abundance of kitchen utensils, towels, and bedding. It is located a short drive outside of downtown Hilo, giving guests easy access to the city's amenities while also providing a charming countryside feel. We really enjoyed hearing the sounds of nature each night - it felt like a tropical oasis.
Beyond the facilities, the host was super responsive and friendly.
We definitely recommend the Cozy Country Ohana House to anyone staying in Hilo.

Beautiful Ohana Cottage.
Quite and peaceful, great views.
Cottage is very clean and comfortable. Love the covered patio surrounding the unit.
Place was like a home away from home. Close proximity to town. Comfortable and exactly what we needed.

awesome spot !! super private and quiet, had more than enough amenities to get us thru a couple of nights, clean, bonus was some very cute animals. Chris was super nice and always wanted to make sure we had everything we needed when we ran in to him. Convenient drive to downtown Hilo- would definitely recommend !

Peaceful place! Nice host! Will
come back!

Everything my Husband and I were looking for!!
Private, peaceful, on a farm with a beautiful view of nature, a gorgeous sunrise and clear view of Mauna Kea and on a clear night, perfect for stargazing!! 🤩🌠✨
LOVE the coquee frogs at night!!🐸
Definitely will be staying there again!!!

Great place!!
It has everything you need to have a good time!
Peaceful, away from the buzz of the city!!
We had a great stay!

don't pass on a chance to stay at this beautiful home.

It's always nice to see and hear from Sylvia. She will check in to see how things are going and will make an effort to make sure I'm taken care of. The clean and spotless room and bathroom is always a plus! You walking into a room smelling like CLEAN! thank you Sylvia!

Five-star rating every time! As a frequent traveler, I appreciate all the little things that make my stay extra SPECIAL! Sylvia is an amazing host. Cleanliness is key especially during these days! Mahalo Sylvia

I'm a HUGE FAN! Booked several more weeks with Sylvia! I had my best sleep at Keena Malu vs. other AirBnB places. It's quiet, comfortable, and PERFECT after a long day at work. A nice place to unwind and relax. THANK YOU SYLVIA!

FIVE STARS ***** Always a treat staying at Sylvia's place! No other place compares or gets close to how safe and comfortable I feel than Keena Malu! I will be back next week! Mahalo Sylvia for all of your special touches!

Sylvia’s place is my absolute favorite place to stay in Hilo! It is so easy to check in and out, it is incredibly clean and beautifully decorated, and it’s just such a fun home away from home. Plus Sylvia is a dream to encounter! I shall return!

Convenient and quiet location close to Downtown Hilo. Private and clean with comfortable bed, comfortable furniture, comfortable towels, and covered parking. Thoughtful touches include small souvenirs and fruit from the backyard. Night light sensor in the bathroom has a good range.

TOP RATED! Sylvia's place is one of the best places to stay in Hilo! 5 stars in all categories: Cleanliness, especially now, is absolutely one of my main concern and she exceeds my expectations. I really appreciate you. It's obvious that you take pride in making sure your guests are taken care of. Mahalo🌸

Comfy & perfect stay for a single traveler! Thoughtful touches like fruit cups in the fridge & bathroom amenities already stocked. The bed is comfy & room is thoroughly cleaned. Sylvia is very easy to communicate with & always has fast responses. Will book again if I ever need a place to stay for a short while! (: Thank you again!
Great place to stay on a budget and traveling through HI! Very comfortable and easy to get to.
Sylvia’s place is a veritable home away from home! It is so inviting, spacious and immaculately clean! Plus Sylvia is a wonderful host! Thanks so much! I’ll be back!
This is the best place to stay in Hilo! Sylvia is a wonderful hostess and the spot is immaculate! I sleep like a baby and feel like I’m in a quaint and cozy hotel. Thank you, Sylvia! I’ll be back!

Lovely quiet clean private place. Would recommend.

Great place! Would stay again.
Simple but has all the necessities and in a great location. I felt safe and comfortable which is important as a solo female traveler!

Great room very close to rainbow falls and restaurants and highlights of downtown Hilo. It's got a private entrance, bathroom, kitchenette for coffee. Had all the amneties I needed. Check in was very smooth even at a late hour. Will definitely stay again when in the area
Sylvia is an excellent host. The space was good, everything was very clean and I really enjoyed my stay in Hilo. The security and convenience were both excellent. I would certainly stay here again.
Amazing location close to the rainbow waterfalls and some snorkeling sites. The place is sparkling clean.
Great local neighborhood with friendly kids playing in the streets before sundown. It’s a 10min walk to the Rainbow Falls. Live long and prosper.
The room was fantastic! Check in was simple. Host was superb, very thoughtful. One of the best Airbnb I have stayed at, certainly highly value for money.

This is a great location, easy to find and close to downtown Hilo. Sylvia responded to my inquiry very quickly. The studio is exactly as featured. The interior was spotless. Lots of nice touches like motion lights and brightly tiled bathroom.

Lucky me to choose Sylvia's house ~ it's exactly same as display phtoes, well decorated, neat and clean, the location is near to Hilo airport, 7-11 store is right at the street corner . Sylvia is a very thoughtful hostess , the room is at first Floor and can enter from the outside which make it more private and more convenient when in out from it. You don't have to concern that would be less convenient than living in hotel, actually it brings lots of comfort and completely star hotel experience. An excellent choice to make for stay in Hilo.
It was 10 minutes walk to Rainbow Falls.Very comfortable. Clean and cozy.Thank you very much.
Easy check in, Sylvia was very polite and accommodating.
Great place. I felt chill and relax during my stay.

So quiet, clean!
This was way better than I expected. A great place especially for a business traveler.

Clean, comfy and cute! Felt right at home here and loved all the thoughtful touches. Would definitely stay here again!
Lovely space, great location, helpful, kind and responsive host.
very well organized and very attentive to the guests. Clean place, and it was much better than expected.
Cozy place. A little further away, but very comfortable. The host is very helpful. I liked it very much, worth the money!

Sylvia’s place is such a cozy and comfortable stay. She has thought out every detail to make my stay non stressful. Quick to text back if there are questions and fresh fruit bowel she hand delivered was so thoughtful. There is parking right in front of the French doors that has a level entry in. So easy to get luggage in and out. There are a few steps inside to get to the bathroom so might be an issue for those with mobility issues. I really loved this place and hope I get a chance to stay again.
Quiet comfortable and very clean place. Would stay again!
Sylvia's place is comfortable, nicely appointed, spacious and very clean. The parking is right outside. Sylvia was very responsive and helpful. A good experience!
I enjoyed staying at her place. Very clean and luxurious. Perfect place
A stylish stay in a great location!
Great studio in a great location. It was perfect staging point for me while in Hilo. Spotless and Sylvia was easy to communicate with.

Silvia's place was great. It felt a bit like home away from home as Sylvia has done a great job decorating the place. It was sparkling clean and Sylvia even provided a few snacks. She made an effort to come down, greet me and also had great tips. I can definitely recommend staying there when in Hilo

It's all as described. Clean, and nicely decorated.
Good base for exploring the coastline
pretty good place to stay, highly recommended.
Sylvia was a fast communicator. I appreciated the clean spot with private access. A couple minutes drive to restaurants and the farmer's market. I walked to rainbow falls.
Nice little place, very happy that I got to stay here! Clean, comfortable, and cozy!

If you want a peaceful, spotless, oasis to escape to, look no further! I slept so well, which never happens when I’m away from home, and it was such a pleasure to meet Sylvia. The space was so thoughtfully decorated and I took such delight in the special mugs that they provided! I absolutely loved my stay and will definitely stay again!
The room is excellent, you have enough place, all is proper and Sylvia is super friendly and helpful. One of the best Host i ever had! Absolutely to recommend!

I absolutely loved my time in Sylvia’s beautiful zen space! I felt right at home, the space is very clean and even better than on the pictures. I absolutely love host that have attention to details and Sylvia has many beautiful details! Loved the little coffee and tea area, the keypad to get in is absolutely perfect, love that fruits Sylvia shared with me the next morning, and all the details as you could tell she put a lot of thought on how to make this space great! Will definitely stay here again! Thank you for everything Sylvia! :)

Rachel’s place was a wonderful place; a verdant green lush oasis. It’s surrounded by tropical trees and plants snd flowers and a stream with a private waterfall.
Rachel and Dan were wonderful and friendly hosts. We would surely return again.

We had a wonderfully peaceful stay at Kulike Farm. Dan and Rachel were fantastic hosts, giving us a tour of their farm and sharing their chocolate-making process. The chocolate was the best we have ever had! Their property is simply amazing, providing a quiet retreat surrounded by nature. We especially loved the DIY breakfast basket filled with fresh fruit and eggs from the farm. The location is also convenient, being close to many attractions. Should we ever visit the Big Island again, we will definitely stay at Kulike Farm.
---

This secluded paradise on kulike farms was just what we needed during our stay . We got a tour of the farm where Dan took us through all of the plants and choate making process ! We were still close enough to Hilo and got to do all the things we planned while getting to stay in a secluded spot .

We love staying at Kulike farm! It is a perfect getaway to feel refreshed, recharge and get blissed out. We love the surroundings and the waterfall. Beautiful place to ground yourself. The house is cute and quaint. Rachel was responsive and helpful! This was our second time staying and we definitely will be back!

I hardly know where to begin! This magical forest retreat was so amazing. It was extremely private, and having our own waterfall so close was so special. I love the philosophy of the farm (off grid - and growing organic chocolate!!). We spent the majority of our trip to Hawaii here, and it was absolutely the right place for us. And the drinking water was fantastic! I usually need to add lemon to our water at home, but the fresh water at the farm was soooo good. I loved listening to the rain - which usually occurred only at night. The frogs were loud at night- I used earplugs, but my husband slept soundly without them. It was a truly memorable experience. I hope to be back one day!

Staying at Forest Hale was like staying in paradise. The accommodation was the perfect size for my family of three. We loved the waterfall (bring water shoes!), private views, and the overall sense of peace we had while staying there. The place was very clean, and I didn’t see a single cockroach inside or outside the house (which hasn’t been my experience with other Hawaiian property rentals). Rachel and Dan were very friendly and welcoming, and we loved taking a tour of their farm and meeting the animals. If you’re looking for an unique, off-grid, and beautiful place to stay that’s in nature, and if you don’t mind driving 20-30 minutes to get into town, then this is the place for you.
