Well organized and appointed!! A kitchen that's better than my own. Bed and bedding that's more luxurious than my own. Fantastic location. All Air BnB hosts need to take a page out of their playbook. Absolutely fantastic!!! Thank you 😊

Shae was a great host. Very responsive and helpful. Host gave clear instructions. A gorgeous place with every amenity and more. That made us feel the aloha spirit. Very comfy bed! I could have spent weeks here if I had the vacation time. Will be back!

Great stay! Shae went above and beyond to recommend things to do and restaurants in the area. She was very responsive. Condo building is dated but the unit itself is great!!! All the amenities we needed and the bed was super comfy!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Shae’s apartment. The location was super convenient since it was close to all Hilo had to offer. We also appreciated all the thoughtful touches such as quarters for laundry, the welcome snacks, and yoga mats! I would not hesitate to book again, we had an excellent stay.

Great location easy to find, spacious parking spot. Shae's house has everything you need, including snorkeling gears, beach towels, yoga matt, even sunscreen. Kitchen is fully equipped. Bedroom is spacious and the bed is quite large with very cozy and clean bedding. Highly recommended!! ♡♡

100% would stay here again. Quiet, comfortable, clean & well appointed with lots of thoughtful extras like bathrobes, local snacks, beach chairs, really soft cotton bedding. Loved the small lanais and the view over parks to the beach & panoramic sunrise. Easy walk to old downtown Hilo. Super quiet neighbourhood. Shae was incredibly responsive and pleasant. Why stay in a hotel when you can have a kitchen and such peaceful privacy?

Shae's apartment went above expectations, we only stayed for one night but regret not staying for longer. The view from the balcony was breathtaking, the apartment itself gorgeous, and we felt spoiled with all the care from Shae.<3 The bed was extremely comfortable, and we really appreciate the extra thought she had having reusable and disposable options for take-away to our hikes! The place was easy to find, good parking spot and ok walking distance to the restaurants where she had given great recommendations!

Good location. Beautiful view from the balcony. Place is dated needs an update.
Didn’t care for the town of Hilo, unfriendly people at some of the recommended places. This was our first time here and unfortunately won’t return to Hilo

Absolutely loved my stay at this centrally located apartment in Hilo! Shae was incredibly accommodating, ensuring a seamless experience from check-in to check-out. The convenient location and fantastic hospitality make this a definite choice for my next visit—I would gladly stay here again!

Cozy, spacious and perfectly organized place. Highly
recommended.
Perfect place to stay in Hilo. We enjoyed walking the gardens. View was great and the bed was large, great sheets and EXTREMELY comfortable. Spa robes were an wonderful touch.

I have stayed in many Airbnb places. This is one of the best well equipped kitchen and apartment with very modern amenities. Shea left some welcome goodies for us with lot of very useful information about local restaurants and places to visit. We had a spectacular view of sunrise. Shea is also very accommodative and let us check in early. We will definitely visit her place again. Shea was kind and generous. We highly recommend her place.

We only had a chance to stay 1 night at Shea's place, since we had to cut our trip short. The place is very clean and comfortable, with every amenity and detail a person would need. She even left quarters for the laundry machine down the hall. The views from the balconies are lovely, close to everything of interest. I would recommend it and would not hesitate to book it again.

Location was amazing, host was super responsive when we had a slight snag. The one thing we were worried about was being right in the middle of things and how that would affect sleeping at night. We had absolutely no issues sleeping at night. I would stay here again and again!
we would happily recommend this condo

Great place, well stocked with everything you'd need and next to a beautiful park with walking trails. Local food places in walking distance close by. Small shower but not a deal breaker, overall we had a great stay in Hilo!

Shae's place is outstanding, very clean and tidy inside and well organized. Had everything you could need, great appliances, good pressure in the shower, as well as a luxuriously comfy quality King Bed which made sleep a breeze. Parking was easy, check in a breeze, gorgeous views out on the balcony in a great location. 10 out of 10 stars for Shae's place!!
It’s a nice place to stay in Hilo! We had a good time here!

Great stay!
The condo is spacious and the view of the sunrise from the balcony is amazing. Everything was well thought out and the kitchen is very well equipped. Loved the "Forgot anything" box and everything else that was provided in the closet.
The location is a good base to visit the water falls, the Volcano National Park, and a day trip to explore the north part of the island.
Overall a nice and relaxing stay. The personal touches really made it memorable for us. Shae was an excellent host and touched base with us regularly to see if we needed anything.

I stayed for three nights in Hilo and Shae was a great host. He was always responsive to my messages and made everything easy for me from check-in to check-out. Regarding the apartment, I liked very much the beddings - extremely clean and comfortable, the tile floor - very clean, and the two balconies giving a great view of the park next to the building (hosting several Nene geese - I saw six), and of the ocean. Overall it was a perfect stay and I am looking forward to return there on my next trip to Hilo.
Clean place, nice view, would go back again

Great stay, apartment was very clean and well stocked with everything we might need. Very clear instructions on how to access and use all the amenities. Appreciate the super soft linens and the beach supplies on hand in the unit. Highly recommend!
Shae’s place was beautiful and very clean! Great amenities had everything we needed to enjoy our time in Hilo! Would definitely recommend Shae’s place!
What a great place! 9th floor amazing view. Clean, modern, well stocked. Luxury. Bath robes! Ha! Do it! So happy with this place!

We had a great stay at the condo. Nice sunrise views, great space with everything we needed, squeaky clean, and clear instructions. We wished we had planned a longer trip so we could explore more of Hilo. We really appreciated the laundry room and the chairs/bag/towels/etc for the beach. Shae had thought of many nice touches. This is a great place to stay!

Wonderful short stay! Great time exploring the local restaurants and shops besides the Hilo Farmers Market. Right out to Wailoa State Park, which the views are spectacular from balcony doors of the condo. Wonderful central secure location to explore. The condo is nicely decorated and loved the beddings for a great nights sleep.
Host communicated well and got back to any questions for my stay. House manual well organized to navigate the workings of the condo and amenities. Definitely recommends!
Shae is a great host. She was very responsive and proactive in sharing recommendations.

Shea's condo in Hilo is the perfect place to stay! The view from it is incredibly beautiful. The location is convenient to everything in Hilo. Inside the condo, Shae has decorated nicely and tried to imagine what any guest might want. It was great to have the Nespresso to make a delicious cup of coffee. The pool looks very plain, but it's actually a great pool and a good size. It was fun to watch all the birds and look at the beautiful lagoon and grounds from there. I will always stay here when I'm in Hilo!

Shea’s condo is very nice , quite and clean
Beautiful view . Great AC both in bedroom and living room ( love it )
The location is great and very peaceful.
Host was amazing and very responsive
I highly recommend to stay with Shea.
I would stay with her again

Shae's condo is everything I was looking for in an accommodation in Hilo. It is right in the smack of town, many good eateries nearby, close to the airport, Rainbow Falls, beautiful beaches. Onsite security made me felt safe. The condo is large with two balconies, lots of room to spread out. Nice view out to the lagoon & mountain. Gorgeous sunrise was captured. Shae was very responsive & did her very best to make my stay comfortable.
