This unit is a great location for Hilo Waterfalls, and Volcanos National Park. Owner responds quickly and the housekeeper is on the same floor and is very helpful. We arrived late due to flight schedules, and she offered us fruit and water which was very kind of herl. The Lanai ( Balcony) faces a nice garden with Koi fish and you can have breakfast watching the birds land in the water. The unit is not fancy but clean and comfortable. Bathroom is clean and shower is nice and hot!
Very good

A place for rest but not located in the center. The pond is very cute. Very well equipped but no detergent and there’s no detergent sold in the laundry room, you have to buy one at the supermarket 6 min walk away. Also the money you paid for the laundry service( an app called wash) is not refundable so you charge more than you need. The sound from upstairs neighbors is sometimes loud.

Don’t be fooled by the gruff exterior of the complex, this is a friendly clean and comfortable condo experience. The balcony overlooks a pond that is hopping with wildlife 24/7 (noisy in a beautiful way if you sleep with the door open!) comfortable bed, futon isn’t as comfortable but great for a kiddo or smaller person I’d say. Stocked adequately but not overstocked. Great water pressure in the shower, though noisy when it’s running. (Not an issue for us, we know it’s an older building). The pool was chilly! Great for the hot day we had. We would definitely stay here again, the neighbors are amazing. We even hung out with some of them two of our nights there and exchanged information. So friendly.
We loved the ponds all around the complex; it kept my daughter busy seeing the fish and ducks, all amenities are provided to cook!
Super cute studio, well equipped (no a/c but plenty of fans). My kid loved the koi pond outside the lanai. Great location, close to plenty of stuff. Ki is a great host, it was smooth and easy.

This was an excellent location and Ki was a great host. He let us check in early, which was really helpful. Overall enjoyed our stay and the apartment had everything we needed. There is no AC (as described in the listing), so it was a bit hot at night but otherwise was a good stay. Loved sitting outside on the balcony - great start & end to the day.
Great place in a very cute neighborhood.
Great location. Ducks in the pond had a lovely vocal morning, but I still slept well in the comfy bed. Woke up with a nice swim in the pool. Everything was great. Would live there in a heartbeat.
Overall a nice place in a convenient location.

If you go to the side road of the accommodation, the pond comes out right away and it was so good to go for a walk. The room is the same as what you see in the photo. You can hear a lot of sounds around in the morning.
Location was great. Very close to local restaurants and sites. It’s a nice place to stay and sleep after a full day of adventuring.
nice budget place in Hilo. apartment had everything we needed for a short stay.
Amazing location!! would stay there again.
Ki has a lovely study and is very accommodating! Plus, Spring is an absolute doll! I highly recommend this place for anyone wanting a comfortable place to stay, right in the heart of Hilo. Mahalo!
Ki's place was clean, at a convenient location, and met our needs. It was near the airport, which was a plus.
The apartment is very conveniently located within a handful of walkable destinations (food, drink, water/beach). We have a great time.
Both KI and Spring are wonderful hosts. All restaurants are nearby and very close to Volcano island. I will stay here again.
This studio is a great place to stay in Hilo. It was nice and clean with full kitchen amenities as well!
good location!!
Everything was as expected here. Great location and easy access. Beautiful morning view from the balcony. Thank you Ki!

The place is close to town and was at a good price point for us. The biggest downside for us which wasn't the hosts fault was the upstairs neighbors. Our first night they were up moving furniture and being loud from 2am until 5am. we assumed at the time they were packing up for an early flight. Then the 3rd night they woke us again at 3am. The place is basic and that's fine we just needed somewhere to sleep after long beach/adventure days. unfortunately for us that didn't work out the best. At no fault of Ki's! it's an apartment complex so we understand.

Ki’s place is in a perfect spot! We were on foot majority of our long stay and everyday we walked and explored someplace new. Great restaurants- Hilo burger joint, just cruisin, pineapples, and pretty much any spot downtown is excellent. The market is good price compared to the KTA for local fruit & veggies. The studio is basic but has everything you need. And if you need something Ki’s caretaker Spring will get it quick. She brought us yoga mats, umbrella, rain jackets, and lots of food! The apartments around the unit can be loud but the fan drowns out the noise. Place stayed cool with the fans and lanai door open. Pool is nice and warm also laundry on site. Ki is an absolutely amazing host and when we could extend our stay he offered us another unit for a great deal. Definitely will stay here again 🥰
very basic accommodations. clean and convenient. bed is good foam. no frills. good value.
Place was clean, easy to access, lots of parking space, great location, and easy to communicate with Ki.
just as expected super simple
Nice condo central to town. Great wifi and Ki was fast to respond to any questions I had. Highly recommend.
Excellent stay 🤙
Great place to stay while in Hilo. No ac though

My error for not catching that there was neither A/C nor TV. Very hot (and humid) without A/C. Fans helpful but of limited benefit and no cross-ventilation.
Directions to parking area would also be helpful as we were quite confused.
No coffee.
Bed okay.
Shower pressure awesome!

This unit is well located between the downtown area and the shopping district on route 11. At one time it may have been a motel room but was converted to a condo with a large refrigerator and a complete kitchen. It's adjacent to the park with the famous bridges near the waterfront. Very utilitarian and should suit your needs just fine. Kitchen wonderful and we found the bed firm and comfortable, unlike many. Slept great. Ki will advise you to use the back parking lot off Hualani which makes it a very short carry for your things. Swimming pool not too inviting(!) but we loved watching the koi pond and the setting is restful and everybody around there was friendly.
Laundry: download the app "Wash Sense" if you anticipate using the w/d. $2/load. You add $ to your account ($10 minimum) from a credit card and use bluetooth to select your machine and away you go. It's very intuitive and very cool. I'd never used my phone to do my laundry before! You don't have to mess with coins or anything.
Really enjoyed it; no complications and Ki was great and responsive.

The unit is in what I would call a middle of the road apartment complex. The unit is older and worn but was clean and functional. The hosts were great and the place was clean. It’s just not the nicest building. Pool was green so we weren’t comfortable checking it out further. Given the options and costs of other units it was fairly priced and a decent value. I would have preferred slightly nicer furniture and it is in need of a good quality paint job in the unit. Was a bit noisy up until dinner time and then the entire property quieted down for the evening. Good, simple, clean accommodations but not on par with some others we have stayed at and not “hotel” quality. A good paint job and quality furniture would make this place excellent.
Loved the place, it was very peaceful
Sweet Hawaiian get away! Had everything I needed to enjoy peaceful rest and relaxation during my stay.

Mahalo, Ryan and Gina for a safe, clean, and peaceful stay. I appreciate all of your thoughtfulness during my stay. Your rental offers a lovely home-base sanctuary, with easy access to all aspects of the Puna/Hilo/volcano areas. See u next time!
Truly a great place to stay. My husband and I felt right at home. Location is perfect...close to Pahoa and Downtown Hilo. Definitely recommend Ryan and Gina's place.

Ryan and Gina's studio is so charming! Very clean, easy to find, very peaceful, great location. The hosts were very responsive and gave us a great list of recommendations of things to do and places to eat. We really enjoyed our time here!

Ryan's place was as described. It was very clean and a good location for going between VNP and Hilo. Ryan was responsive and made sure we had a great stay. The bed was a little too firm for me but my partner didn't mind it. Thank you Ryan!

Ryan’s place is in a great location. I loved how central it was to Hilo, volcano National park, and Pahoa. The kitchen and appliances were helpful during my stay. I didn’t get a chance to use the pool since I spent most of my time at the beaches in Hilo. Overall a good place to stay especially if you will be out and about!

This was the perfect place to stay while in Hawaii! This place had everything we needed and more! We especially appreciated the pack and play crib, it was even all set up for us upon our arrival! The host does an excellent job with communication. We enjoyed our stay and I would definitely recommend this place to friends and family!

Everything was exactly as described. Perfect spot. Had everything we needed. My husband lived the firm mattress. Ryan also provided a wonderful list of recommendations to do on the island from hiking, snorkeling, and places to eat. They did not disappoint.

Your perfect Hilo getaway! Nice place in midst of lush, green surroundings, very tasteful interieur, perfectly clean and neat. Kitchen was very well equipped, we didn‘t miss a thing. You can cool down in the pool on hot summer days, it was a shame we couldn’t use it due to the weather. 10/10 recommend!!!

Clean and host was responsive and had great local recommendations. A little smaller than I expected and as listed about 20 minutes from Hilo, but very well located to other locations. Beautiful area and tons of birds.
We like airbnb rather than a hotel- less noise, confusion. Ryan’s place is accommodating, very clean and tastefully decorated. Super host!
We enjoy the accommodation and quick access to the main road. The space was exactly as expected. The host are friendly and very responsive. Great place to stay while being on this side of the island.
Ryan and Gina are great hosts, they gave us very good tips and recommandations during our stay. The room is nicely decorated and fully equipped !! We definitely recommend this airbnb :)

Ryan's place was perfect! Close to Volcano National Park, waterfalls and beaches! We had a very last minute booking and Ryan was great to accommodate our needs. His wife, Gina, was so kind and made sure we settled in. They also brought in a comfy single bed for our third guest. Water and snacks were a welcomed surprise. Highly recommend!
The place was very nice and we felt very much at home. She had good amenities and communication with Ryan went wonderfully.

We stayed here for 5 nights and the place was very clean and new. Nicely decorated as well. It’s pretty much the size of a hotel room with a large bed and small kitchenette that served us well for our stay. There is a main house and the 2 private detached suites are farther up the property. 15 mins away from Hilo, definitely need a car (which we had). Overall a great clean place to stay and would definitely stay here again! Thank you!

We had a wonderful time at this place. Friendly owners, everything you need in the cottage, super clean, and easy access to a lot of beautiful hikes and great places to visit like Volcano and many waterfalls. Also some good restaurants nearby.

Comfortable and clean. I didn’t end up using the pool because I spent most of the time at the beach. But the BnB had everything I needed at the end of the day. Good internet for when I needed to work. Plenty of fans to keep cool. Clean kitchen to cook breakfast. Comfy bed to sleep.
Ryan and Gina were excellent. Their place is very quiet and peaceful. Great for visiting friends and family in the Hilo area.
Amazing place! Super cute and cozy. Had everything my partner and I needed for our 5 day stay. Would highly recommend!

Very nice place!
All comforts!
Very nice pool to make a splash at the end of the day or at the beginning of the day before taking your walk.
Great location. Very
responsive hosts, kind.
Ryan provided great recommendations for this side of the island! Great Airbnb experience and the sounds of the island put you right to sleep at night!

This was a great place to stay, Ryan was always very responsive and ready to help with any questions or concerns. It's easy to tell that they are committed to providing a great place for people to stay, would definitely stay here again.
Hosts were very welcoming, very responsive, and accommodating. The studio was cozy and everything we needed in a place to stay.

Well decorated. Close to volcano and Hilo being right in between. Host was proactive with messaging and friendly. Only qualm is place is listed as whole home but is a studio apartment. Can tell this from the photos however

Let me say the place was well stocked, clean and in a great location for people exploring this side of Hawaii. We did however have two issues, check in was a little confusing as there are now two cabins. We didn't know which was ours so we tried both. Also, the pool we thought was private didn't realize till we got there that it was shared. Other then those two things everything else was great. Nice touch on the welcome gift on table.
Mahalo Nui loa.
Charles and Ken
Was exactly what I was looking for in a place:)
Amazing hosts! Clean and nice place to stay. The nature and beautiful surroundings is out of this world!

Comfortable and enjoyable stay. I stayed in February, so no AC wasn't an issue. Equal distance between Hilo and beaches on the south eastern coast. I had a rental vehicle so driving was easy. The space was nicely appointed and everything worked as expected.

We had a baby during our travels and the hosts were very accommodating. There's a beautiful pool and bar space... Too bad we had rain during our stay, it looked beautiful.
All in all, great hosts everything was as described. They definitely go above and beyond

We loved our stay here! We came to visit Hawaii for our anniversary, and Ryan and Gina's place was perfect - private, quiet, peaceful, and romantic. There were a few great restaurants and views minutes away, Hilo was only 20 minutes away, and Volcanoes NP was a quick 30 minute drive. The house was the perfect launching spot and home base. The place was the perfect size for a couple, and we were able to use the kitchen to make breakfast and lunch. Ryan and Gina were super nice and friendly, and answered all our questions very quickly. Ryan also gave awesome recommendations on things to do all around the island. We loved our stay here and would love to come back!

Amazing tucked away spot. Far enough away that we drove to the Hilo town center, but we loved the privacy and you can’t even tell theirs neighbors. We loved the pool, although it wasn’t heated, the area was dope and we enjoyed the ambience of it! Even the little walk to the pool was super rad and felt like we were definitely in a jungle. Not only was the Airbnb beautifully clean and perfect for our group of three, the host had great response time and was super super accommodating. I will definitely be booking again when I’m on Big Island for work!

Great space.
Always cool(shady).
Great wildlife night sounds.
Allowed me to drop off luggage before actual checkin. Saved my life.
Lovely space. Communication was on point. Heading back in a week, what more can I say?🤷🏼‍♀️🤷🏼‍♀️🤷🏼‍♀️
Ryan and his family were wonderful hosts! We really enjoyed our stay the places was clean, tidy and a convenient location to explore around the island :) Mahalo

The location is gorgeous and serene, and not too far from Hilo or Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. We were celebrating our honeymoon, and Ryan & Gina put up a sweet sign, and set out a bottle of champagne welcoming us, which was a nice touch. They were quick to respond to messages, and suggested wonderful places to visit and eat. The unit itself was clean, nicely decorated, and was just the right size for the two of us. We would stay here again, and highly recommend this place!

Ryan's place was just perfect for us. They took our reservation at the very last minute and accommodated us nicely. The location was convenient. The house was very clean, bright and nicely decorated. Everything we needed was readily available and Ryan was very responsive. I reccomend this listing.
great, clean, and peaceful place.

Convenient, cozy and clean! My friend and I stayed here for a girls’ trip to the big island. It was perfect in every way. The cottage is modern, clean and spacious. Comfortable beds, plenty of amenities and everything you could really need. The hosts were so accommodating and welcoming. It’s located in a peaceful neighborhood, close to everything great on the island’s east side. Highly recommend staying here!
Great communication and very understanding when we needed to cancel early due to personal situations
Ryan and his family are exceptional hosts. The unit is sweet and spacious with all you need. I highly recommend this Airbnb for a restful getaway. Enjoy your stay. Wini and Tom.

We had a great stay with Ryan and Gina. They were incredibly hospitable while giving us complete privacy. We don’t mind chatty with our hosts in person, but we didn’t want to intrude on their home life either.
The location is great for exploring the entire east side of the island. We had great adventures every day and a comfortable stay each night. We only took advantage of the pool one afternoon…it was fabulous after a long day to cool off.
We hope to stay again on our next trip down.
We had incredible weather while we visited, so I will warn you, it’s hot and humid on the east side. We left the windows open and got the studio to cool down pretty quickly after the sun went down. I slept better here than in Kona!
Fair warning: there are frogs and chickens singing most of the night, and an occasional feral cat. If you are sensitive to sound, bring ear plugs. I loved it (reminded me of crickets), but my husband slept with ear plugs in.
AMAZING through and through. Perfect stay for our first trip to the Big Island.
Absolutely amazing experience. Listing looks and is just the way it’s presented. I would definitely stay here again coming back to Hawaii! 10/10/10. A big thanks y’all!

We had a wonderful stay at Ryan’s place. It was so quiet and peaceful. Great communication and very helpful host. Loved using the private pool after a day of adventuring in the Hilo area. Would definitely stay here again!
We loved our stay! Not far from volcano and great to have the full kitchen for cooking if needed. Super clean as well. Ryan communicated well, we’d definitely stay again.
Great quiet place between Hilo and Pahoa. Perfect home base for adventures on the east side of the island.

Beautiful airbnb. Super clean and in good location. Has smart tv, parking, and comfortable bed! Lack of kitchen supplies though like coffee. We didnt get a chance to use the pool because we were afraid we gonna disturb the host because it was behind the main house but I checked it out and it looks great. Host was very accommodating! Overall i would recommend.

Gina and Ryan were wonderful hosts! We stayed over New Year's and were pleasantly surprised by a bottle of sparkling (non alcoholic) cider in the room to celebrate. The roku TV was great for relaxing, we ended up not using the pool but it was great knowing we had access to it. The bed was very comfortable and the kitchen had many amenities! And the onsite parking was very handy!
Close to the National park and away from all the rain in Hilo. Didn’t work out for our long term stay, but a quiet little cottage tucked away in a private neighborhood. Good for couples

It was a fantastic stay! Very clean and in a quiet neighborhood. Hosts were very responsive and helpful. Not far from volcano National park and close to a lot of the islands great hikes. Hilo has a lot of waterfalls and great farmers markets to visit.

Ryan and Gina were fabulous hosts! We could not have found a more perfect spot for our Hawaiian Adventure. It was clean, well thought out, had all the essentials and more, and the hosts were very responsive with suggestions on the area. Mahalo until we meet again.
It's a nice clean quiet private cottage I would stay there again

This place was amazing! We like to stay further away from the typical touristy areas and this was perfect. We had our privacy but also in a great location for hikes, seeing the volcano, golf, and hot spring beaches! Ryan and Gina were such amazing hosts. They had great food suggestions, that were also close to the house, and even getting amazing massages in our room! They even went as far as letting us borrow a personal back pack for a hike that we needed. Definitely would suggest this place to friends!

We were so comfortable there. It was very clean and nicely decorated. We had a wonderful time in Hawaii ( our first time) and would return to this Airbnb again. We had another Airbnb that didn’t work out and Gina and Ryan opened there’s up for us without any notice. Thank you both very much
Awesome communication once we booked. Great jump off place for exploring especially Volcanoes.
Ryan’s place was very clean and comfortable. He also gave amazing food/restaurant suggestions. I’d definitely recommend this place!!!

We ended up booking this place very last minute ( on the day of the check in at 8 pm) due to issue with originally booked place, and I was happy. The host- Ryan was very responsive and helpful. He welcomed us even when we reached super late. The place is very clean, modern and has everything you need. The beds are very comfortable and Ryan even provided a Playpen for my little one. The only down side we faced was a heat wave. The ventilation could be improved as the 3/5 nights were super hot and our kids were having having hard time sleeping as well. Ryan responded so well even late nightby providing us an extra fan but it was HOT inside which was hard to manage. Ryan, Gina and kids were wonderful to us and we loved spending time at their cottage
Absolutely wonderful. Very clean, tropical rainforest feel. Nice parking. Exceptionally comfortable beds. Very nice and welcoming.

Ryan’s place was absolutely the Best. The place was Super CLEAN. Ryan was Very thoughtful, accommodating, patient, and understanding. Quick to respond. The pool was Super Awesome. Probably one of the BEST pools i have ever been in. Even had a Garage to keep the car nice and cool from the sun and away from the rain. I’d absolutely recommend this place to others and I’d definitely stay again. Loved it. No downside about this place at all. Exactly what we needed for a Father’s day weekend. Will be in our memories for a long time :) Thank you Ryan!

We had an amazing stay with Ryan. The house was clean and had everything we needed for our trip. The location is ideal, just a short drive to Hilo, and communication around check in and check out was easy. We also enjoyed the pool to cool off on a warm day. Thanks Ryan!

Seriously such a beautiful place! Ryan was incredibly helpful whenever we needed anything. Whether is was restaurant recommendations or letting us borrow a vacuum for our rental car. It was an amazing stay!

This was a fun and comfortable stay. Responsive hosts who were super welcoming and kind. Definitely take advantage of the pool and their cool Bluetooth speakers for a relaxing vibe. You will need a car to get around the area, but there is food/groceries nearby and even a laundry mat. Recommend for anyone looking for a getaway.
Great cottage with everything you need for a Hawaii vacation. Hosts are amazing, helpful and accommodating.
You'll have the whole place to yourself. It's a great location that's really easy to get to nicely located near Volcanoes National Park and some black sand beaches.

Nice & quiet neighborhood, very great location overall a beautiful Air bnb . Very comfortable and gave off a nice home vibe. Sweet family and very welcoming. Didn't get to enjoy the pool during our stay due to our busy schedule. 10/10 reccomend

Wonderful extended stay in this beautiful studio. Very comfortable bed. Everything I needed in kitchen to make my meals. Great reliable strong internet and big table to work on . Quiet neighborhood ; typical Hawaiian bird songs during the day and frogs at night, and that’s what I love. Location is wonderful for easy access to Hilo or Pahoa. Hosts were attentive but not intrusive. I will stay again. And there’s a pool for you!

Ryan and his family are amazing hosts. They had loads of recommendations for snorkelling sites both around Hilo and throughout the whole island.
The guest house is lovely, and we were the first people to use all of the fixtures.
The location is great to use as a base to explore the Eastern side of the island.

Beautiful home in a peaceful setting. Our family of four enjoyed the soaking tub and fire. The home is serene and served as a wonderful respite following days of hiking in the very nearby Volcano National Park.

This little cabin was adorable and perfect for exploring that side of the island. After a day of travel it was so nice to walk in, relax and soak in the hot tub. Our goal was to explore the national park and see the volcanos and you are literally right there so the location was perfect. This cabin is cool aesthetically and very clean. Jeff gave us some local restaurants and places to stop along the way which was very helpful

We were a couple beginning our honeymoon in Hawaii, and this was great home base for exploring Volcanoes National Park! We enjoyed coming home to the hot tub after a long hike each day. The Airbnb was clean and has a modern design with great amenities like a washer/dryer, gas fire pit and the hot tub. Comfortable bed. Would recommend to anyone looking for a stylish and comfortable place to stay when visiting the park. Jeff provided local recommendations and a little welcome pack of snacks and water.
Nice place to stay in Volcano!

We loved our 2-night stay while visiting Volcano National Park. Perfect spot for exploring and relaxing! Felt private and secluded with all the lush rainforest greenery surrounding. It was rainy during our stay so we didn’t get to check out the fire pit but hot tub is nice extra.
There are not tons of dinner options nearby so be prepared for that. Plenty of places for lunch though - check out Tuk Tuk Thai Food Truck for lunch!

Jeff was the most responsive and understanding host I’ve worked with. Volcano is such a special place, I’m so happy I found this home to settle into while there making my trip that much more special :)
Absolutely beautiful and idyllic. Super clean and lovely.

A Scandinavian oasis in Hawaii! The place is gorgeous, just like the photos. The hot tub and fireplace were such a treat after a long day of exploration at volcanoes national park. The kitchen was stocked with snacks, which was a nice touch. Lots of extra plush towels and robes. Highly recommended!

All in all it was a small, perfectly clean cottage. We would have liked a little more cooking utensils.
And what was a bit difficult for us was the shower. The water pressure was hardly present and the hot water was very unreliable and got cold more often in between.
The listing includes Jacuzzi. In fact, it's a bathtub with warm water , which could have been a little hotter for the cooler outside temperature.
In general, we enjoyed the accommodation very much. The heating was really great!
We also had some bad luck with the weather because it rained permanently and was only 18 degrees during the day and only a little over 10 degrees at night.
If you get soaked from the trip to the accommodation, you just need hotter water to warm up again.
So in fine weather it would probably be completely 5 stars, but just one point deduction , as the price was just too high for it.
The rest was perfect! Mahalo

Jeff's place was ideal for our stay in Volcano. The setting is peaceful, and sufficiently far from the road to be perfectly quiet. The design is excellent and inspiring. Access is easy, and the location is exactly where you want to be to explore the east side of the big island. Definitely recommend!
We had an amazing time!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Great place and host!
We are so happy that we decided to stay at the treehouse instead of a resort while on our vacation in Hawai'i! Staying here was a unique and memorable part of our stay!

Beautiful place as pictured and described. We had to get creative on cooking, as the kitchen is minimally stocked. There are enough restaurants in the area to skip cooking all together. Be aware that Volcano can be very wet. That said, well worth the visit for the park and hikes.
Loved the private little getaway. Perfect location to go the Volcano National Park. It’s not too far from Hilo to check out the Botanical Gardens.

This was one of those rare times when everything was perfect and the place matched the pictures and descriptions as advertised. The host provided delicious snacks, introducing us to some amazing local foods! Our only regret was that we could not stay longer!

This space is something special and our family was so lucky to experience it. Everything here is immaculate, rarely have we encountered an Airbnb so clean and well kept. The layout of the house takes advantage of every square foot it never felt cramped. We are a family of four and it was perfect for the few days we were in Volcano. The fold out was surprisingly comfortable, no complaints from our teens. Jeff deserves every rave review on here!

I have been looking forward to this stay for long and it turned out to be one of the highlights of our trip. Location is easy to find - there is a doorplate by the road. We arrived at a cold wet night, the fire warmed up our body and melted our heart, it brightened up the little trees around and also our memories. In the morning, waking up to nothing but sounds of rain and birds was another heeling moment. It is hard to believe someone designed and built such a hidden gem that’s beyond-word. Everything is perfect. Every little pebble is in the right shape, every plant is in the right place: outside the window, under the tub, around the fire pit. Bedding and towel were super comfy. Jeff is nice, welcoming and responsive, and he is now the person I envy most for owning this little gem.
amazing stay! 10/10
Beautiful home tucked back in the trees made it feel secluded. The location was perfect for getting in an early morning hike at Volcanoes National Park.

Great private forest retreat in Volcano! I especially appreciated Jeff’s flexibility on checking in to Kuono earlier than the usual check-in time. The place was exactly as described. It was probably the nicest Airbnb that I’ve stayed in! Beautifully constructed, fast Wi-Fi, nice amenities (cedar outdoor hot tub was a nice touch) as well as all the comforts of heat, clean drinkable water, and bath toiletries in the middle of a very rural area. I highly recommend this spot for a very unique experience when visiting the Volcanoes National Park area!
Great location for Volcanoes National Park. Clean. Communicative host.

Great place-very quiet surroundings and private. The cabin has a lot of trees and vegetation around it. There are mosquitoes in this area and all the windows had great screens to allow fresh air in and keep the insects out. It was a very peaceful stay. I would recommend buying groceries, if you plan to cook at the cabin, before leaving a larger city.
Beautiful and comfortable home for our stay in Volcano!
It was a nice place to stay! The soaking tub was great. Kitchen is small with a mini fridge. Lots of good towels and the bed was lovely.

Amazing home - had absolutely everything we needed & more. Only stayed one night & wished we booked a couple more nights. Will definitely be visiting again & will re-book this airbnb 100%! Would recommend this spot to anyone looking for a relaxing stay in volcano
The fire pit is nice and tidy
It’s exactly like the photo. Very breathtaking view. Though there is a small maintenance issue, Jeff communicated very efficiently and overall the experience was amazing.
Absolutely loved staying here during our visit to the Volcano National Park. It was peaceful and very private. The bed was very comfortable and all of the amenities were wonderful. Highly recommend!

Great place! If you’re scared of the dark or being “secluded,” probably not the best place for you haha. There are neighbors but it’s PITCH BLACK outside so a little scary. But nobody bothered us. Place is beautiful.

For lovers of modern architecture in a place where it's not so common, this place checks the box. Makes you wonder why there isn't more great design and build happening on the Big Island. For it's modest size, it has everything you (or 2 people) would need for a quiet, secluded stay near Volcano National Park. The large outlook to the ohia trees, a firepit, and an ofuro lured me to booking here and these features did not disappoint. If all our homes could be as relaxing as this space, we'd probably never leave home.
Thanks for the respite, I look forward to staying here the next time I visit Volcano.

We really enjoyed our stay at Kūono. Volcano is a magical and peaceful destination, and this cabin just feels like it belongs in the ō’hi’a forest. We especially enjoyed the design of the home, the treats left for us in the kitchen, the fire pit, and the comfortable bed.
This home is beautiful, perfect for a stopover in the town of Volcano. Very clean, beautiful hot tub and extremely comfortable bed.

This place is serene and beautiful. The architecture is well-designed, and the supplies in the house are of good quality. The location is very close to the entrance of the volcano park and several restaurants. Jeff is very informative and responsive regarding anything about the house. Overall I had a wonderful stay here and definitely will come again if Im in Big island.

What a wonderful gem. A complete stand out in the area. Great design, very well maintained, super clean and a delight to stay at. The outside fire feature was an especially nice touch. Jeff responses were very quick and appreciated. Would definitely stay again.

Such an amazing experience and 100% recommend to anybody hesitant on booking this airbnb. The only downfall is the jacuzzi and fire pit does face towards the road and when the blinds are down you can see inside from the outside when lights are on.

I can’t say enough great things about this idyllic getaway. The house was so cool. 10/10 recommend. Jeff was very responsive, and the guidebook gives great recs for nearby restaurants and things to do. Awesome awesome awesome!!
Beautiful. Right by the Volcano. Cedar hot-tub. Romantic fireplace. What else can i say?
Immaculate home and location, friendly and kind host, 10/10 recommend!

We stayed at Kuono for 3 nights during our stay on the Big Island. We thoroughly enjoyed the hot tub and fireplace for the cool evenings. The home was super clean and it's proximity to HVNP made it so easy to enjoy the area!

The bathroom is really nice especially with the heater. Attention to detail was much appreciated such as the mosquito repellent coil and snacks being provided. The host was kind and accommodating. The hot tub and the fireplace outside was the highlight of the place. Excellent for guest of two. I had brought two kids with me and they slept on the sofa that turned into a platform; they told me it was not as comfortable as a normal bed so that would be the only downside. It is a bit pricey but the location (close to volcano village and the national park) and the amenities make up for it, not to mention it’s Hawaii after all.

Great cabin in Volcano! The location is very close to the park entrance and Volcano Village. Love the design details, privacy, surrounded by nature, and a great hot tub. We had a wonderful stay and would highly recommend!

PROS:
-Home is equipped with anything you would need to feel right at home.
-Home is close to Volcano National Park.
-Home was clean.
CONS:
-Difficulty locating the home in the dark because there are no street lights and the wooden house number pole is a little tucked in the driveway with no lights to indicate the sign, driveway, or home. (We did message Jeff for directions and he responded and called us immediately to assist us in finding the home.)
-Across the street are abandoned homes with busted windows, abandoned cars, and trash bags laying out that we discovered from getting lost in the dark upon check-in that made us question the safeness of the neighborhood.

Absolutely the best place to stay when you are looking for accommodation near volcanoes, National Park. We really enjoyed it from the first minute that we stepped inside this beautiful tiny house.
Super responsive host, very kind, and he made sure that we arrived to the house, and that check-in was easy and smooth.
The house is very modern and a super romantic place. The fireplace outside was one of our favourites, and of course the view of the forest from the bed.
Recommended 100%! We will be back…

Jeff's modern cabin is perfectly situated in a wooded area. The views out of the windows of ferns and crocosmia are picture perfect, and you have a sense of isolation, even though you're in a neighborhood. The Scandinavian "feel" is prevalent in design and furnishings. Great attention to detail; has everything you need without any clutter. Immaculate!

We had a lovely stay at this beautiful tropical paradise! It’s just like the photos and very clean. Perfect location to enter the volcano park, which is just a few minutes away. The linens, towels etc were high quality, giving this a more “upscale” feel. We recommend Ohelo restaurant (3 minutes drive) great food! and the bowling alley (10 Pin- inside the park!) for a funky place to have a beer and play arcade games.
LOVED your place!!!
We had a great time here! Definitely will come back again! Love the design of the house and the fireplace is just amazing!
Great place.

We had a great stay at Kuono. It was the perfect jumping off point to explore Volcano National Park. The house was clean, modern, and had everything we needed. The snacks and water were a lovely touch.

Very well designed and unique house. Well equipped with all you need, super comfy bed, functional kitchen, Bluetooth speaker etc. Volcanoes National Park entrance is less than ten minutes down the road. We had an issue with the hot water, but Jeff was super responsive and able to get it fixed very quickly. Fire pit is a great spot to hang out after a day of hiking. Would definitely come back!
We would definitely stay here again.

We had a nice stay at this very modern cabin. The space was clean and bright and just like the pictures. It faces the road but there are not too many cars. The police were there for a bit at the house across the street but otherwise no major disruptions.

The facilities were clean and a good spot to heal.
It was nice to relax and feel the sensibility.
However, it was a little cold at night.
Great stay at this wonderfully designed cabin. Close to everything Volcano has to offer. Peaceful and private. Lived up to my expectations.
Loved the space! Bit spendy, but that’s Hawaii for ya
A really great time. Loved it!

Very cozy stay! Beautiful architecture and right by the national park! Very private location (in a neighborhood but surrounded pretty heavily by trees). Was a little hard to find at first since the GPS address was a bit off and we arrived at night, but overall a fantastic stay!

I commend the owners for great marketing and a beautiful house with fluid modern architecture,however it is only a space for overnight not lengthy stays. The bed was comfortable.The kitchen is small with a small refrigerator. The bathroom is efficient. This place looks great on paper and the pamphlets are professional. Unfortunately It faces the street, which leaves no privacy in the hot tub. The neighborhood is lacking with neighbors yelling at 5am. The hot tub breaker kept tripping and it never really got hot during our stay but it is aesthetically beautiful. This rental was modern unfortunately we felt very disappointed with the price.

As described and seamless check-in/check-out. Great little tiny house a few minutes from Volcanoes National Park entry. We made this place work as a family of 4 (with 2 teens). Kuono, in my opinion, is likely more suitable for parties of 3 or less.
My favorite part was waking in the morning to the morning sun shining through the wall of windows.
We had a great time! Definitely recommend staying here if you can. Very close to the park and restaurants!

We loved this place! Lots to do nearby and we loved the fire and soaking tub, it made a great ambience! It was the perfect location and such a beautiful design! The perfect combination for a restful and rejuvenating time! Highly recommend!
Close to national park, clean and modern place. Nice experience and highly recommended.

We enjoyed our stay at this little cabin. It had a very home like feel, a great place that is very quiet and away from the city. It was only a couple of miles away from Volcanos, and the place had everything we needed.

We loved the place, very close to Volcano National Park, beautiful architecture integrated in an incredible surroundings. We will keep incredible memories from our trip: not only the beautiful places we visited, but the experiences we lived, and where we stayed.

Jeff's place was in a beautiful part of the world, next to Volcanoes National Park and tucked away in the trees, and is beautifully designed and private. We felt very comfortable there and enjoyed the nights on the patio with the fire pit. A great spot to stay if you want to explore Volcanoes as it's not too far a drive from the park entrance. Would stay again.
Excellent!

This place is a dream. Everything is carefully and intelligently constructed with a great eye for design and detail; both inside the house and on the lanai. Property is landscaped beautifully. Proximity to the park is amazing. Luxurious details but also family friendly. One of my favorite places we have ever stayed; we hope to return!

Modern, simple, elegant and clean. Just an overall spectacular place to stay. Quiet, great location and amazing. The whole process to reserve, check-in, check-out, communication, etc was quick, simple with details that are needed. We will definitely stay here again.

Unique and stylish tiny house in a residential neighborhood. Very convenient to Volcanoes National Park, about a 10-minute drive to the park entrance station and visitor center. Comfortable bed, clean and functional bathroom, small but fully equipped kitchen. Some of the best features were on the lanai (a roofed, open porch): an elegant, heated wooden soaking tub for two and a gas-fueled firepit that turns on with the flick of a switch.
Exactly as described and a perfect location if you are visiting Volcanoes National Park!
Great property, friendly communication, highly recommended!
Great proximity to Volcano National Park. Highly recommend stopping here, even for just a night, so you can get an early start for everything the Volcano National Park has to offer.
Great stay! Very close to the volcano national park so makes it easy to spend more than one day there

The place is beautifully designed and situated, with a great forest view and total privacy. The cedar soaking tub overlooking the woods is a highlight. Great finishes throughout the cabin and a perfectly serene setting. We really enjoyed our stay.
Nice

Amazing location close to the National Park. My family loved being close to everything and the house is like a little escape into the rainforest with great adorable restaurants nearby. Definitely recommend Jeff’s place!

The cabin was even better than we expected. It was spotless, had luxurious linens and towels, and stocked everything we needed to rest and enjoy our evening before a full day at a the national park. We were even able to make s’mores! The cabin is very aesthetically pleasing - great attention to every detail, with beautiful finishes and furnishings. Our host, Jeff, was incredibly kind and responsive. Five stars on all fronts. We will definitely look to stay again the next time we visit.
Jeff’s place is fantastic, a tranquil private oasis that is spotlessly clean and every detail has been carefully thought through and designed.

Beautiful spot near Volcanoes National Park and surrounding restaurants! Jeff's place is an architectural and design jewel in a quiet neighborhood. We enjoyed mornings on the patio, and listening to the peaceful forest sounds at night. Beautiful floor to ceiling views and a great find. Thank you Jeff for sharing your place!

Our family vacation at Kuono was a splurge but it was a once in a lifetime location to stay at. The place has been designed with great care and details. It was really peaceful and we enjoyed sleeping to the sound of the rain and nature with our windows slightly opened. Communication with Jeff was very easy and the extra length he went to in welcoming with macadamia chocolates, taro chips, water bottles for the four of us, etc. was a nice surprise. The place has everything you need and even a chess board, a game my family loves. Kuono was spotless ; inside and out! The exterior table and chairs were just as cleaned as everything else inside. The location couldn’t be better. Right next to Volcanoes National Park and the village where several restaurants serve delicious food. Thank you for a lovely stay!
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Kuono. Everything has been designed to make you feel good, in the heart of nature, three steps from a unique site in the world! Thank you Jeff!
We absolutely loved our stay and didn’t want to leave! Super peaceful and enjoyed the fire pit and hot tub each night. We hope to come back soon!
A beautiful and perfect place to explore Volcanoes National Park and the surrounding area.
Beautiful place, it was better than the pictures! Thank you!
This was an incredible stay, highly recommend to all. It was both peaceful and beautiful, and has everything you need for your stay in Hawaii.

This a gorgeous one-room cabin, obviously as well-designed as its reputation. The few critiques I have: it is not a cabin in the woods, it's on a neighborhood street and so it's not secluded we'd imagined (you can see the house across the street from the hot tub; hear the house on the right); the constant heat from the dishwasher/dehumidifier was very uncomfortable in the kitchen; and the price. It's high for a kitchenette, but you pay for the location near the national park. The rest was excellent, thanks Jeff.
Great place to stay while visiting Volcano’s National Park. Just book it! You won’t be disappointed.
Very nice house, very helpful owner.
Great stay and close to the park!
It was everything it’s pictured on the photos. Very beautiful and peaceful place. There’s nothing but trees around it but I loved the quiet time I had for myself. Would 100% recommend

We had a wonderful, relaxing stay in Jeff’s cabin. The place is just as described and we had just enough space for two adults and two kids. We cooked simple breakfasts in the kitchen, spent time in the national park, enjoyed the Thai restaurant in Volcano, and relaxed on the patio and in the soaking tub. It was the perfect spot to listen to sounds of the forest.
Gorgeous design, beautiful tiny house. Very comfortable bed and couch. Very quiet and intimate surroundings.
Jeff’s place was awesome! We had a wonderful stay!

Best Air BnB stay so far! Jeff has designed an amazing experience for anyone who likes to enjoy the beauty and elegance of the nature while staying in the comfort of a masterfully designed space. Soaking in the hot tub looking at the fireplace in the night was my personal favorite of the stay. Me and my family (with two kids - 3 and 8) had an amazing stay all around!
We had a great stay! Gorgeous home. The cedar hot tub and fire pit were magical.
Great stay close to the National Park.

The house is beautiful and has a sense of design, but it is too small for two people.
The kitchen is too small and not a dishwasher is very inconvenient.
I was wondering if the dishes would be cleaned before checking out and going back to their original places, so I was wondering if the dishes were cleaned again before changing to a guest?
The advantage of the house is that it is very close to the volcano park, there is a campfire, there is a hot tub, it is very clean, and the photos are beautiful.

Elegant, comfortable, impeccably clean and well appointed cabin in a very convenient location near Volcanos National Park. We loved our stay here and would highly recommend it. I've stayed in several rentals in the area and this was by far my favorite. Jeff was responsive and easy to work with.
Great private location close to the national park. Very relaxing with huge windows overlooking the trees. Would highly recommend!
Beautiful! Amazing location- soaking tub is wonderful. Easy check in! Thank you again!
Kūono at Volcano is absolute perfection. This is place to get away from it all and hit the reset button. Thank you Jeff, for a wonderful experience!
Perfect stay to visit the National park. The place has everything you need and more. Location was ideal. Highly recommend.

We LOVED our stay at this cabin. Close to the crater and all the hikes. Beautifully designed; minimal interior which made for such a peaceful environment. LOVED giant wall of window making this feel like the ultimate glamping stay (:

Jeff’s place was very quiet and serene. At first (as we had arrived at night), it seemed like the house was out in the middle of the woods. However, upon daylight it became clear that the cabin is actually settled in a neighborhood but the ohia trees in the backyard have been left to grow wild. Very nice illusion of privacy. Inside was quite clean and the kitchen was very functional. We stayed with two little kids and two adults and there was ample space. Will definitely stay again.

Excellent cabin just minutes from the volcano! We stayed one night after spending the entire day exploring Volcanos National Park, and the outdoor hot tub was the perfect end to a day of hiking! The house is as advertised and clean. located in a beautiful woods setting. We loved our stay and would definitely recommend!

Anybody who wants to explore Volcano national park should definitely stay at this stunning cabin.
The cabin has been built the perfect set of amenities for visitors to
Great location if you are visiting Volcano and the national park. Very close to the park entrance, and a comfortable place to stay.

Kūono is one of the best places we have ever stayed through Airbnb. The cabin itself is meticulously designed and finished with all the amenities that you need, including an exceptional outdoor area with a fire pit and two-person hot tub. It’s location is very private and serene—you feel like you are far removed from from everything. In many ways, it was the ultimate glamping experience!
The town of Volcano is a short drive away and there are several good dining options and a small store. If you plan to stock up, best to stop at the Foodland outside Hilo on your way up. The highlight of the local attractions is Volcanoes National Park. And it’s close enough to visit for a short hike or a drink at the Volcano Lodge.
One piece of advice: bring earplugs. The frogs (which are an invasive species on HI) are unbelievably loud at night.
Very nice room with a stove and bathtub.Great living experience.
Awesome spot near Volcano
Jeff space was perfect! Conveniently located near Volcano National Park and great local eateries.

Nice cozy place to stay at while visiting the Volcano National Park. It is modern and spotless. Less than 10 minutes drive to the Volcano National Park visitor centre and 35 minutes away from Hilo.
Our car tire went flat on the day we checked out. The housekeeping lady was very friendly and helped us communicate with the car rental company.
Overall, we enjoyed our stay.
Nice house, super hot tube, everything you need was there...we would have liked to have stayed longer.

Amazing place and the perfect home base for Volcanoes National Park adventures! Jeff was super responsive and you can tell he put a lot of thought into the little things at the cabin. Sitting on the couch watching the sun though the trees and drinking some coffee was an amazing way to start our morning. My tip for fellow travelers, Jeff’s staykuono .com site has an amazing area guide that I didn’t notice until after doing my own research. His area guide had all my ideas and more! Start there with planning and save some time.

Beautiful place with everything you need, very close to the national park which was ideal.
Very responsive host, thank you so much.
Beautiful place!

From the moment we booked Jeff’s place we were excited. The cabin has a modern vibe perfectly mixing with nature. Jeff made sure we were aware all what we need to know before checkin.
QuickTip: Try and checkin before sunset as to get some extra time to enjoy the fireplace and hottub.

Such a magical spot! I felt relaxed the moment we pulled in the driveway. Came here with husband and two boys and everyone really enjoyed the space and vibe. Jeff was extremely responsive and helpful when we ran into issues (small things - hot tub wasn’t heated when we arrived, couldn’t figure out sofa bed right away). Highly recommend!!
The place was awesome

Jeff’s Airbnb was super cute and he was a very responsive host. There was a very brief outage of power across the area and Jeff was immediately responsive and helpful. The Airbnb was very close to the volcano national park.

Beautiful, serene, worth the price. So close to Volcanos NP. Felt private even though we were relatively close to neighbors. All of the right amenities tucked into a small space without feeling cluttered or overdone. Loved the fire pit.

Jeff's cabin in Volcano was incredible. The thought and design that went into it is truly incredible. Everything from the simple, modern aesthetic to the Parachute linens on the ridiculously comfortable bed. If you want to enjoy Volcano in style and comfort then book Jeff's place. It's truly one of a kind.

Very nice cottage, the outdoor hot tubs were perfect and the atmosphere of the forest at the end of the day was magical.
Beautiful place to discover
Beautiful cabin in the woods but more luxurious!!! Love the architecture and sitting around the fire. We had a great stay!
Absolute gem! One of the best Airbnb experiences so far. We will be coming back again soon!

Hard to describe what an amazing place this is. I've had my eye on it for awhile and when the opportunity to island hop became available I jumped on a night at Jeff's place.
Mahalo Jeff! We loved it.

We had an extraordinary and relaxing time surrounded by wonderful nature.I will be back here for this experience.
It was a starry sky like a planetarim at night.
Perfect space to be close to the national park and still having a quiet and comfortable place to relax when not out exploring.

Probably the most gorgeous spot to stay in all of Volcano. Beautifully designed, clean and coziest. Very Hygge. Cozy blankets, hottub, fire. Perfection rain or shine. It will be our go to spot anytime we are on Hilo side. Thanks Jeff!
Extraordinary place. Magical. The fire with the backdrop and the tub is not to be missed. Serene, comfortable, private. Amazing bed and the design is special. It's an A++.
Loved our stay here! Very minimalist and serene. Great to be so close to the volcano. Would absolutely recommend for anyone looking for a peaceful getaway!

We had a wonderful stay at Jeff’s beautiful property. It’s a truly unique, gorgeous space and we loved having a modern place to stay in such close proximity to the park. Jeff was a great host and left a little care package for us with a guidebook for the surrounding areas. Our only regret is that we didn’t get to stay longer! Highly recommend.
Special little house in volcanos park!
Stunning comfortable tiny house, including the amazing hot tub.
The location is incredibly convenient for accessing Volcanoes National Park. The amenities are as described in the listing and the host is very responsive. I would definitely stay again!

Jeff has built a beautiful place in Volcano. Serene, peaceful, sustainable. The soaking tub and fire pit were exactly what we needed after a long hike in Volcano National Park (mere minutes away from the house). Jeff also included some great chips/chocolates, which was a lovely treat to arrive to after the drive down. We look forward to visiting again!
Such an amazing place with amazing features. Great location when wanting to visit Volcano National Park especially at night. Well worth it!
Great stay! Very close to volcanoes national park

If you are a person of quality over quantity, this place is for you. We enjoyed every minute of our stay here. Very fine architecture, great quality material, functional spaces and just amazing experience all in all. Highly recommend, if you want to elevate your experience to next level!
Beautiful clean house. Felt like we were one with nature. The location is perfect if visiting the park.
I lived in this house about a year ago. I liked it very much. So this year I came back here again. This is a wonderful house. I recommend
Spectacular, modern cabin in Volcano!
We absolutely loved every minute of our stay here 🤍

Kūona is the perfect spot to rent if you are looking for a well designed space close to Volcanoes National Park. The cabin was a beautiful and clean space with little luxuries that we appreciated—high quality sheets, a cedar soaking tub, welcome snacks, and adjustable lighting. You can’t tell as much about the property from the photos, it is a fairly small lot that is close to a non-busy road and neighbors. However, there is plenty of foliage and it still felt very private. Our 2 night stay was excellent!
We had a great time. Close to the national park.what a great space!

Great place Jeff-
Very memorable. Great blend of nature and architecture. House was warm and inviting, clean and modern.

Loved every moment of our stay here!
Such a beautiful, tranquil spot nestled amongst the trees.
Only a 5 min drive to Hawaii Volcanoes National Park which was incredible and would have gone on many more visits if we had more time! Perfect spot if that is the main thing you are hoping to see.

Tucked away in the heart of Volcano, this cabin is perfect for couples wanting to relax and unwind but can accommodate up to 4 people. The futon folds down into a full sized bed and is actually extremely comfortable! Please note the cabin is set up studio style, so privacy between 4 people would be limited however the vaulted ceiling makes the space feel very open and comfortable. There are many nice touches around the cabin including the bathroom equipped with a heater, and fully functional kitchen! The soaking tub is incredibly relaxing and the cabin has everything one would want or need! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone. The host is super responsive, easy to communicate, has great recommendations, and even gives a local welcoming gift!

What can I say? This place is fantastic! The place itself is beautifully designed, the bed if comfy, nice bathroom and has all amenities. I like the patio with the outdoor fireplace and soaking hot tube. But the location is perfect to visit the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, in particular when there is lava flowing at the Kīlauea crater (like when we visited), so is easy to wake up at 5AM and after a shirt drive park and walk to the viewing area ahead of sunrise. Amazing to see the lava during darkness! I will go back to this place!

Our family of 2 adults, and 2 kids stayed 4 nights at Kuono. We‘ve stayed in Volcano many times, and this cabin is definitely a rare gem. It’s a little snug for 4, I’d say best suited for 2 people. With kids it would nice to have a dining table for proper seating at meal time, especially for longer stays.
Naturally the hot tub, and fire pit were huge hits. The all in one washer/dryer is also super convenient if you plan to be out all day. Gorgeous Ohia Lehua trees surround the property, which just add to the beauty of the stay.
Can’t imagine this cabin would truly disappoint anyone.

The architecture and property were stunning, but it was not as secluded as the photos made it seem. The inside was fine, but nothing special. We had a nice time and appreciated the thoughtful touches like welcome snacks and guidebook, but overall didn’t feel like the space warranted the price.
We had a great stay. We found the cabin to be as beautiful as the pictures. It was a great spot to stay while exploring the national park. Jeff was very helpful. We would stay here again.

If I could build a cabin in the woods, it would be just like this one! The quality, thoughtful design, harmony with nature and modern elements provided an absolute enjoyable stay. The built-in dehumidifier, awnings over the windows and even the design of the windows (no water intrusion when raining) for an area that rains as much as it does was much appreciated. A comfy bed, high output BTU firepit (you could actually feel the heat!) and outdoor/covered soaking tub for two ... we wished we could have stayed a few more nights!
Thanks to Jeff for opening up his cabin for others to enjoy. We certainly did!

Clean and cozy! We stayed here for 3 nights while exploring Volcano and the nearby beaches. The cedar hot tub, outdoor fireplace, and large windows provided a memorable “wow” factor that made our stay extra special. Jeff is a excellent host! He was very friendly and answered all of our questions within minutes. Thank you for the great experience!
Wish we could stayed more than one night. Very cute AFrame with high ceilings and a quiet serene setting.

What a magical escape in the hills of Hawaii! The photos match the reality. If you're looking for an escape away from the hubbub (but close to Kilauea), you're in luck! Soaking it that tub was pure serenity.
Incredibly amazing space that brings the outside inside! The night sky from the fire pit and hot tub . Is just perfect! I’ll be back next year for sure!!! Awesome host too

We booked this modern cabin for one night in Volcano and it was very special. The design is impressive, the owners/builders are professional design people and it shows. We loved waking up to the view outside the huge window. Snacks and coffee pods/K-cup machine were provided. The fire pit at night lent an intimate feeling, we enjoyed whiskey and hot tea while watching the stars. A few restaurants were a short drive away. I recommend this for anyone looking for a quiet, private place to stay near the volcano national park.

This is truly the best airbnb we’ve booked. Host is responsive. Nice place. Love the washer & dryer 2in1, that’s very important for travelers. And the sunscreen, aloe vera gel, etc. Very sweet and considerate.
A wonderful spot for easy access to the National Park! Highly recommend a couple nights here to experience the park at night and see the volcano in action. Thanks for the awesome stay!

Fantastic spot to stay and the perfect place to retreat to after daytime hikes and adventures. Every detail is thought through so you have exactly what you need from kitchen items to cozy robes. The view of the trees and simple space layout allowed us to relax and enjoy this beautiful spot on Big Island! Definitely on our list to return again soon.
Everything has been said in the comments, this place is so great and well situated. We really enjoyed our 3 nights ! Perfect for a romantic stay 👌🏻

The photos of this space are spot on, it’s really beautiful. Super convenient location to the nearby park, we were able to leave midday and come home for lunch and easily zip back to the park in the afternoon. Quiet, private, and super comfortable bed and linens.
Some things to note, many of the dining options in volcano close early. If you’re coming from hilo, it wouldn’t be a bad idea to eat there or grab takeout before you head to volcano at least until you get the lay of the land. The kitchen is really small as noted, so I wouldnt plan on cooking meals if you can help it, but it was fine for heating up breakfast or leftovers.
loved it. original. unique. simple yet luxury .

This is a truly stunning property and made me wish we had longer to spend in the area. Everything about the house, communications, and interactions with Jeff was perfect! This set the bar extremely high for any other short-term rental property.

We had a great stay! The Airbnb was very clean and decorated nicely, the amenities were nice and the extra touches like snacks and toiletries were thoughtful. This was very convenient to the park, I would recommend doing a night hike to see the Kilauea lava. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend staying here if you’re visiting the park.

Listing is just as perfect as described, very clean and comfortable with everything you need. I wish the cabin offered a/c but with the windows open at night it was tolerable. Would definitely book again!

We have had a most wonderful time ! What an elegant space that is well designed and connected with nature. Everything that we needed was available and we were able relax and explore the area. Jeff was very helpful and easy to communicate with. We enjoyed the nightly frog serenades and varieties of beautiful birds.The convenient access to Volcanoes National Park and dining at the rim was certainly a hit ! We are looking forward to another visit !
Lives up to the hype. Beautiful design, great host, very clean and comfortable, well located to get after it in the park and to enjoy the small town of volcano. Hot tub and fire pit were next level.
If you are looking to stay in Volcano, you can’t be this place. Looks just like the posting, everything was clean and very comfortable. A must stay!

What a calming wonderful place. The informational booklet of local attractions was Super helpful. We also really appreciated the yummy unique snacks and water they provided. It was a welcome treat after a long day of driving.

This place is truly fantastic! From the start, we had great support leading up to and for checking in. We had a wonderful time unwinding and spending time in Volcanoes. What Jeff has done with the quality of the amenities as well as the styling is great!
Amazing rental. You feel like you are in your own private oasis. Place is exactly as it look, amazing!

One of my all time favorite stays. Relaxing, tranquil, well designed. Would love to stay here again! Very conveniently located close to the park.
We had trouble finding the control panel to turn on the hot tub when we first got there. It’s by the front door of the house in the kitchen area. Turn on the switch at the panel if hot tub isn’t on when you arrive! Other than that, it was awesome!!
Perfect place to stay for a romantic getaway by Volcano National Park!

We really fell in love with the place. The cabin is just perfect, the location is minutes away from the Volcanos park and Jeff was very responsive whenever we had questions. I'd recommend this to anyone visiting the area.
Jeff's place is wonderful! We enjoyed listening to the tree frogs singing every night. The national park is also super close!

Absolutely gorgeous details in the design. It feels very secluded and private. Incredibly convenient as it is located just a short drive to the entrance of Volcanoes National Park and the town of Volcano. Loved sitting by the fire pit at night listening to the frogs.

Kuono is a gorgeous cabin!
A wonderful place to escape, with luxury touches like plenty of soft towels, premium linens, USB port bedside chargers, and labeled light switches w/ dimmers. It is exactly as pictured in the posting.
Easy check-in and great communication.
A few elements of the cabin made it a bit less comfortable: very thick oversized pillows made for a challenging night’s sleep, the shower door makes the bathroom floor very wet, and the bathroom sink was a bit clogged during our stay.
I’ll also note that it’s only semi-private, as it’s in a neighborhood with closely situated homes.
Otherwise, a lovely experience for those visiting the national park!
Fantastic! Everything that it seems on the listing and more.

The Volcano house hosted by Jeff is a absolutely amazing. It is so close the Volcano national park you can easily wake up early to go see the sunrise. The fire pit, hot tub and outside area at the house is where we hung out almost 100% of the time while we were there. The kitchen, bathroom and living area were extremely clean, new and everything worked properly. Do not miss this rental if you are looking for a cool spot!
Absolutely amazing! Loved every bit - perfect jump off point for volcanoes national park and Hilo
Wonderful location to explore Volcano National Park.Very clean,great architecture.The sound of the birds at night is amazons.

This place is one of a kind. Loved the details of the house. A very unique experience! Clean, had all the amenities and beautiful mornings. If you want to have a wilderness experience and yet luxury this is the place. Jeff was very responsive and kind.
The only thing we struggled is getting there at night. But that’s on the Volcano road.
There are no street lights and it was raining so it was difficult to find the place. Drive slow at night and you’re good :) Drive is easy in the day!
This was a fun and special place to stay very close to Volcano National park.
We had an awesome time during our stay!
Wonderful little spot. Super quiet and on the more interesting side of the island imo. Less than 10min away from Volcano park which has spectacular hikes and views.
Amazing modern cabin & so close to Volcano National Park! We loved the hot tub and listening to the birds at night.

My fiancé and I had a terrific 2-night stay at Jeff’s place. The location is immensely convenient for visiting Volcanoes National Park and the house is well-equipped, masterfully designed, and delightfully secluded.

What an incredible place!! It is exactly as it appears in the photos, maybe even better. Extremely convenient to get to Volcano National Park, yet still feels remote enough to enjoy peace and quiet. Loved staying here and would absolutely stay again next time we visit the area! I could not recommend this place more highly.

This modern cabin was perfect for our stay. It is very close to Volcano national park and 30-40 minutes away from Hilo and black sand beaches. There are limited options to eat so we preferred to go to Hilo for that. The house was stocked with a welcome basket (some snacks and water) which a nice surprise. Jeff was very responsive when we had any questions. when back on the big island this would be our choice to stay.

Our family really enjoyed our time at Jeff’s Airbnb. The house is amazing, and it accommodated 2 adults + 2 kids (but we only ate breakfast here). We’ve never see so many stars on a clear night. Highly recommended if you’re visiting the nearby national park.

Gorgeous house, probably the most beautiful house on the island. :) We were super comfortable here and wished we could’ve stayed longer.
Kitchen was equipped with everything you need to cook. LOVE the combo washer dryer, we just throw in a load and go out and come home to clean dry clothes!!! Bathroom was beautiful and clean with very good water pressure.
Super close to Volcano National Park & a really good Thai food truck (Tuk Tuk) and a market. We loved staying here. Thanks for hosting us!

This little cabin was amazing! Everything about it was perfect, we are a family of 4 and didn’t feel cramped at all! We love the proximity to Volcano National park, it was so convenient to back and forth to the park and to get over there at night to see the lava! We can’t wait to stay again!

Beautiful home! It was a great location for seeing Volcanos National Park and the Hilo side of the island. Would stay here again as Jeff is a great host and the home is so well done. Very romantic for our honeymoon!

Hands down one of my favourite places I have ever stayed at. Everything about Kuono was perfect. So incredibly comfortable, clean, and beautiful. How special to be able to look out at the forest, sit by the fire or in the hot tub and look at the stars. Such a quick drive to the Volcano Park entrance too - we missed the rush of people and were able to get a calm, early start to the day. If you are on the fence about staying here, just do it! You won't regret it.

Jeff’s place was just magical! The house itself is a perfect size and we enjoyed sitting in the hot tub with the fire going (even in the rain it was perfect). We even went in an out of Volcanos National Park a few times as it was so close in proximity. Could not recommend this spot more on your time during the big island!
The cabin was the perfect lodging after a long day of hiking at the park & exploring the Big Island. We loved the attention to detail and the fire pit & hot tub on the lanai was romantic.
Fantastic find, very unique option for lodging and incredibly convenient to get to Volcano and the national park for early morning hikes before the crowds become a factor. highly recommend.
Highly recommend. Jeff is a great host and the place is a wonderful quiet oasis. The perfect place for a relaxing vacation.
